La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Llankachinapac Community Bank, which is located in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Elsi. She is 35 years old, is married, and has two children. Her business sells sweets, including cookies, desserts, soda, mineral water, and chocolate, among other things. This business is located in the Urubamba terminal. She works every day and, in this way, takes her family forward. She is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for her business.

Mrs. Elsi is thankful to those who help her pursue her dream. She is dedicated to paying her installments promptly.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her business

loans.name: Gloria Narcisa

texts.es:
Gloria Narcisa S. R. tiene 47 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con el compañero y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Gloria se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.
Le gusta salir a caminar.
texts.en:
Gloria Narcisco S. R. is 47 years old. She lives in Uníon Libra in the district of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos with her partner and three children.

The members of V.R.V La Union (the Union Community Bank) are located in the Aguas Frías area, in the district of Ventanas. They pursue short-cycle agricultural work, growing corn, rice, and beans. They spend a lot of time doing this activity.

Gloria has worked in agriculture, growing corn, rice, and beans, for 15 years. She buys her supplies in Ventana and sells them in the Ventanas market in the same area.

She is requesting this loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for her crops. The support from this loan will help her financially to supply the necessary goods. She faces obstacles including plagues, illnesses, and variation in the climate. Her dream is to buy land. She enjoys going for walks.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Edwin Oscar

texts.es: El Sr. Edwin, vive la zona del Cementerio en una casa en alquiler, trabaja en la una  línea de minibús muy conocida de Sacaba, trabaja de lunes a sábado los domingos se dedica a su familia , el préstamo lo destinara para la refacción y mantenimiento de su minibús ya que es su principal herramienta de trabajo  ,tiene dos hijos en colegio uno de ellos este año sale bachiller muy orgulloso de sus hijos, su esposa vende  api con pasteles en las noches frente, su sueño del Sr.  Edwin  es juntar dinero para la compra de un terreno y así tener su propia casa, consciente de que tiene que trabajar muy duro para hacer realidad su deseo, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Edwin lives in the Cementerio district in a house that he rents.  He works Monday through Saturday on a well know minibus line in Sacaba.  On Sundays, he spends time with his family.  Edwin will use this loan to refurbish and maintain his minibus, which is the primary tool of his trade.  He has two children in school, one of them will gradate from high school this year.  He is very proud of his children.  In the evenings, his wife sells api (a hot beverage made out of corn) with pastries.  Edwin’s dream is to save enough money to buy a plot of land and have his own home.  He knows that he has to work very hard to make his dream a reality.  He is very grateful to this institution for their financial support.

loans.use: Refurbishment and maintenance of minibus

loans.name: Virginia Griselda

texts.es:
Virginia Griselda S. R. tiene 53 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con el compañero y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Virginia se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ahorrar y seguir trabajando para la familia e incrementar el negocio.
Le gusta salir a caminar.
texts.en:
Virginia is 53 years old. She lives with her common-law husband and their children in the canton of Ventanas in the Los Rios province. She has 3 children.
The members of the community bank V.R.C. El LA UNION can be found in the Aguas Frías precinct which belongs to the canton of Ventanas. This group works in agrictulture, growing crops such as maize, rice, and beans. They have been doing this work for a long time. 
Virginia is a farmer and mostly grows maize, rice, and beans, and has been doing this for 15 years. She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells them in the marketplace in Ventanas in the same precinct. 
She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for the crops. The loan will help her to meet her financial needs. She faces challenges such as agricultural pests and diseases and climatic variability. Her dreams is to save and to be able to continue working for her family and to grow her business. 
She likes to go out walking.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Dusabane Group

texts.en:
Theresie is 44 years old and married to a stone mason. She has five children who are between six and twenty-four years old. Two of her children attend school, but others have failed to continue due to lack of school fees. Theresie is a group leader of a borrowing group called Dusabane in Kinyarwanda which means share together in English. 

The group members all have different businesses at the marketplace which is not far from their residential places. Theresie sells a variety of items in her shop such as rice, maize flour, sugar, soft drinks, and many more. She has been doing this business for a period of eighteen years. Since her business is prospering, she decided to request this loan to add more merchandise to sell, and she believes that the profit from this business will be used to re-invest in her business, because she needs to expand her business to the extent of becoming a wholesaler in the future.

loans.use: To buy more items such as rice, maize flour and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Cruz Rocio

texts.es:
Cruz Rocio B. M. tiene 26 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con el compañero y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Cruz se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es vivir en una casa donde pueda tener un establo para sus animales que le gustaría comprar.

Le gusta salir a caminar con la familia.
texts.en:
Cruz is 26 years old. She lives with her common-law husband and their children in the canton of Ventanas in the Los Rios province. She has 2 children.
The members of the community bank V.R.C. El LA UNION can be found in the Aguas Frías precinct which belongs to the canton of Ventanas. This group works in agrictulture, growing crops such as maize, rice, and beans. They have been doing this work for a long time. 
Cruz is a farmer and mostly grows maize, rice, and beans, and has been doing this for 15 years. She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells them in the marketplace in Ventanas in the same precinct. 
She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for the crops. The loan will help her to meet her financial needs. She faces challenges such as agricultural pests and diseases and climatic variability. Her dreams is to live in a house with a barn for the animals that she would like to buy.
She likes to go out walking with her family.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Arcoiris De Huitel Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama ARCOIRIS DE HUITEL, porque ellas consideran que los arcoiris son de buena suerte y tambien porque un arcoiris no tiene un principio ni un fin y a si consideran ellas su negocio pero sobre todo su amistad. Este grupo está ubicado en la Ciudad de Tula de Allende Hidalgo. La sra Maria Margarita P. es la presidenta del grupo. Tiene 55 años, estudió hasta tercero de primaria, tiene cuatro hijos los cuales ya estan casados. Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas echas a mano y en comal, negocio que tiene ya hace ocho años de atenderlo, la conoce la comunidad y es por eso que vende muy bien por la a tención y la amabilidad con la que la señora  las atiende. Ella quiere este credito para la compra de maiz para que asi pueda tener mejor calidad en sus tortillas, asi como una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Arcoiris de Huitel' (Huitel Rainbow) because its members believe that rainbows bring good luck and also because a rainbow has no beginning and no end and that is how they think of their businesses and, above all, their friendship.

This group is located in the city of Tula de Allende Hidalgo.  Mrs Maria Margarita P. is the group's president.  She is 55 years old and studied up to the third year of elementary school.  She has four children who are already married.  Maria sells hand-made tortillas which she cooks in a 'comal' (a flat earthenware pan).  She has had this business for eight years.  Maria is known in the community and for this reason her tortillas sell very well.  She serves her customers with attention and kindness.  She would like this loan to buy corn so that she can make better quality tortillas and also enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn to make tortillas

loans.name: Adriana Del Pilar

texts.es:
Adriana Del Pilar S. R. tiene 39 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con el compañero y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Adriana se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es que todos los hijos estudian y tengan un titulo profesional.
Le gusta limpiar la casa.
texts.en:
Adriana is 39 years old. She lives with her common-law husband and their children in the canton of Ventanas in the Los Rios province. She has 3 children.
The members of the community bank V.R.C. El LA UNION can be found in the Aguas Frías precinct which belongs to the canton of Ventanas. This group works in agrictulture, growing crops such as maize, rice, and beans. They have been doing this work for a long time. 
Cruz is a farmer and mostly grows maize, rice, and beans, and has been doing this for 15 years. She buys her supplies in Ventanas and sells them in the marketplace in Ventanas in the same precinct. 
She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for the crops. The loan will help her to meet her financial needs. She faces challenges such as agricultural pests and diseases and climatic variability. Her dream is that all her children will study in school and take-up professions. 
She likes to clean the house.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LLANKACHINAPAC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María Antonieta; ella tiene 45 años de edad, divorciada  y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus  actividades diarias con el negocio de bisutería, ella misma elabora aretes,collares,pulseras, todo en material de alpaca y fantasía, para luego distribuirlos a sus amistades y personas que le solicitan.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de material de bisutería para su negocio.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
María Antonieta is a member of the “LLANKACHINAPAC” Communal Bank.  This bank is in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the Urubamba province, Cusco department.

María Antonieta is 45 years old, divorced, and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her jewelry business.  She makes earrings, necklaces, and bracelets from nickel silver and costume jewelry materials.  She then distributes them to her friends and the people who request her jewelry.

She is requesting the loan to buy more costume jewelry material for her business.

She is grateful to those who have helped fulfill her dream and promises to complete her payments by the established deadline.

loans.use: To buy more costume jewelry material for her business

loans.name: Safina

texts.en:
M. Safina lives in the Busega neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has 6 children, three of whom are in school.     

Safina has a retail shop business.  She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Safina sells her products in a shop, by means of retail. Safina has requested for a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy  more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap and jerrycans of cooking oil. The main business challenge(s) for Safina include transportation. Her aspirations for her business are to expand her business.   

Safina lives in a home that she rents. She has access to electricity but doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees, rent and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise like bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap and jerrycans of cooking oil.

loans.name: Deylin Del Socorro

texts.es:
Deylin de 29 años de edad es soltera, tiene 2 niños en edad preescolar, labora el MINED Santo Tomas desde hace 9 años como directora en una comarca de Santo Tomas. 

Esta solicitando  su 4to credito con el objetivo de Instalar el servicio de agua potable y luz en su casita, al mismo tiempo desea legalizar su propiedad, ya que solo cuenta con el titulo de dominio, y sie el dinero alcanza terminar una pared de su cuarto, pues solo tiene levantada la mitad y el resto la tiene cerrada con zinc. 

Sueña con tener su vivienda con las condiciones necesarias para que sus hijos crezcan en un ambiente agradable.
texts.en:
Deylin is 29-years-old.  She is single and has two children of preschool age.  She has worked in the Santo Tomas Ministry of Education as a manager in the Santo Tomas district for nine years.

She is requesting her fourth loan with the goal of installing drinking water and electrical service in her house, and at the same time she would like to legalize her property as she only has the deed now.  If the money is enough, she will finish a wall in her bedroom as she has only raised it halfway and the rest is still finished with zinc. 

She dreams of having her own home with the necessary conditions so that her children can grow up in a pleasant environment.

loans.use: Installation of basic services and finishing a wall

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LLANKACHINAPAC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Edgar; el tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de cuyes, que luego son distribuidos a sus clientes que se encuentran en el mercado local de Urubamba, a la vez el socio se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de papa, maíz entre otros.  

El socio solicita el préstamo  para la compra de insumos para su negocio como alimentos balanceados para las diferentes clases de animales que cria.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "LLANKACHINAPAC". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Sr. Edgar.  He is 38 years old, married, and has two children.  The member alternates his daily activities with the business of raising guinea pigs, which then are distributed to customers located in the local market of Urubamba, while the member spends time in farming to grow potatoes, corn, among other crops.

The member requesting the loan for the purchase of materials for his business as feed for different classes of animals he breeds.

The member thanks those who form part of this dream by means of this method, and he commits to comply with the payment of his dues on time.

loans.use: El socio solicita el préstamo  para la compra de insumos para su negocio como alimentos balanceados para las diferentes clases de animales que cria.

loans.name: Alex

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LLANKACHINAPAC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Alex; el tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes, gallinas y cerdos y luego lo distribuye a sus amistades o personas que lo solicitan. El socio es contador de profesión pero por el momento se dedica al negocio.

El socio solicita el préstamo  para la compra de insumos para su negocio como alimentos balanceados para las diferentes clases de animales que cria. 

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "LLANKACHINAPAC".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Sr. Alex.  He is 34 years old, living with another person, and has one child.  The member alternates his daily activities with the business of raising animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs and then distributes them to his friends or people upon request.  The member is an accountant by profession but for the time being is committed to his business. 

The member is requesting the loan for the purchase of materials for his business as feed for the different kinds of animals he breeds.

The member thanks those who support his dream by these means, and he commits to comply with the payment of his dues on time.

loans.use: El socio solicita el préstamo  para la compra de insumos para su negocio como alimentos balanceados para las diferentes clases de animales que cria.

loans.name: Bella Vista Group

texts.es:
La   representante del grupo es la Sra. Rosamery , tiene  dos hijos de los cuales  uno ya es independiente, ella  y su esposo son panaderos su trabajo comienza a las  3:00 de la madrugada para que puedan vender a partir de las 6:00 de la mañana este trabajo es muy sacrificado por el horario de trabajo su préstamo destinara para aumentar su capital  comprando harina y azúcar para estas fiestas de fin de año ya que realizaran el preparado de panetones navideños, tienen su casa propia pero con muchas necesidades  todavía.
El grupo solidario BELLA VISTA esta conformado por personas con mucha iniciativa y trabajadoras, el préstamo lo destinaran para su mercadería e incrementar su capital.
texts.en:
The representative of the group is Mrs. Rosamery, who has two children, one of which is who is now independent.  She and her husband are bakers and begin their work at 3 in the morning so that they can begin selling at 6.  The work is sacrificed by the working schedule.  She will use the loan to increase her capital to purchase flour and sugar for the holidays to prepare Christmas panettone.  She has her own home but still has many needs.

The solidarity group BELLA VISTA is made up of people who have great initiative and work ethic.  The loan will be used for purchase of merchandise and to increase their capital.

loans.use: COMPRA DE HARINA Y AZUCAR

loans.name: Johnny Alfredo

texts.es:
Johnny Alfredo Y. Z. tiene 24 años. Es soltero  vive con los padres, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Johnny se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajando para tener dinero.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Johnny Yepez Alfredo Z. is 24. He is single and lives with parents, living in the territory of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  He does not have children.

The members of V.R.C. El LA UNION are located in the district of Aguas Frías, belonging to the territory Ventanas.  This counter is committed to farming and short-cycle planting of corn and rice and beans.  This activity takes up a lot of time.

Johnny has devoted his time to farming, especially the planting of corn, rice and beans for three years.  He purchases his products in Ventanas and sells them at the fair in Ventanas and in the same district.  

He is requesting this loan to purchase farming supplies and fertilizer for crops.  The support of this loan will help him financially to meet his needs.  He faces challenges such as pests, diseases, and the changing weather. His dream is to continue working to make money.  He enjoys sports.

loans.use: insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes

loans.name: Fe Y Accion 1 Group

texts.en:
Yomaris is a member of her group Fe y Accion 1 (Action and Faith). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner. She says that her most difficult challenge is to build her house. In the meantime she plans to continue enjoy operating her business.

Yomaris is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for 3 years, starting with some savings she had. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying a bag of used clothes and various dozens of underwear. She will use the profits to save, while she waits to see her dream come true (to have her own house and to live peacefully). 

This Esperanza associate began with us because the loans are to do business and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. Her group is located in Hato Mayor, an area famous for her agricultural activities and her rural scene. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy underwear and second hand clothes.

loans.name: Nanondiral Group

texts.fr: Nanondiral  est un groupe de 4 femmes qui habitent dans la localité de Bambilor. Elles exercent  la même  activité et pratiquent le commerce de lait frais, lait caillé et d’autres diverses marchandises. Elles ont une expérience  de plus de 10 ans dans leur activité. Elles parviennent avec leurs bénéfices à régler  certains leurs besoins. Le groupe est membre de la caisse de Bambilor depuis aout 2010 et sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs en vue de renforcer leur fond de commerce.  Leur objectif est d’accroitre leur épargne et de mieux prendre en charge les dépenses pour leurs petits besoins sociaux.
texts.en:
Nanondiral is a group of four women who live in Bambilor. They are in the same business, selling fresh milk, curdled milk, and various other products. They have more than ten years' experience in this business. With their profits they are able to meet some of their needs. 

The group has been a member of the Bambilor branch of UIMCEC since August 2010 and is seeking a loan of 500,000 francs in order to boost working capital. Their goal is to increase their savings and better meet their expenses for minor daily needs.

loans.use: Increase working capital

loans.name: Darwin Stalin

texts.es:
Darwin Stalin C. G. tiene 23 años. Es soltero  vive con los padres, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Darwin se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.
Le gusta salir a bailar.
texts.en:
Darwin Stalin C. G. is 23 years old. He is single and lives with parents in the territory of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  He does not have children.

The members of V.R.C. El LA UNION are located in the district of Aguas Frías, belonging to the territory Ventanas.  This counter is committed to farming of short-cycle planting of corn and rice and beans.  They have been doing this for many years.  

Darwin has devoted his time to farming, especially the planting of corn, rice and beans for three years.  He purchases his products in Ventanas and sells them at the fair in Ventanas and in the same district.  

He is requesting this loan to purchase farming supplies and fertilizer for crops.  The support of this loan will help him financially to meet his needs.  He faces challenges such as pests, diseases, and the changing weather. His dream is to purchase land.  He enjoys dancing.

loans.use: insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes

loans.name: Carmen Irianda

texts.es:
Carmen Irianda Y. Z. tiene 34 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con el compañero y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 4 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Carmen se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es que comprar un carro.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carmen Irianda Y. Z. is 34 years old.  She is in a common law marriage, and lives with her husband and their children in the canton of Ventanas in the Los Rios province.  She has 4 children.

The members of the rural communal bank "La Union" are from the Aguas Frias precinct, which is part of the canton of Ventanas.  The members of this communal bank are farmers who do short rotation farming, cultivating corn, rice and beans.  They have a lot of experience in this type of work.

Carmen is a farmer who has been growing corn, rice and beans for 15 years.  She buys her products in Ventanas, and sells her crops in the Ventanas market in the same precinct.

She requests a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for her crops.  The support of this loan will help her financially to buy the supplies she needs.  In this area the farmers encounter challenges such as pests and diseases, and climatic changes that affect their crops.  

Carmen's dream is to someday buy a car.  In her free time she enjoys participating in sports.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Teofilo Cesario

texts.es:
Teofilo Cesario V. A.  tiene 41 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con la compañera y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.
 
Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Teofilo se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es sembrar cacao.
Le gusta salir con la familia.
texts.en:
Teofilo Cesario V. A. is 41 years old. He lives in Unión Libre in the district of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos with his partner and three children.

The members of V.R.C La Union (the Union Community Bank) are located in the Aguas Frías area in the district of Ventanas. They pursue short-cycle agricultural work, harvesting corn, rice, and beans. They spend a lot of time doing this activity.

Teofilo has pursued agriculture, growing corn, rice, and beans, for 15 years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells them in the Ventanas market in the same area.

He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for his crops. The support from this loan will help him financially to supply the necessary goods. He faces obstacles, including plagues, illnesses, and variation in the climate. His dream is to grow cocoa. He likes to go out with his family.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Lucila Giralda

texts.es:
Lucila Giralda Z. V. tiene 52 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con el compañero y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Lucila se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 15 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño construir la casa.
Le gusta salir con la familia.
texts.en:
Lucila Giralda Z. V. is 52 years. She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner and children. She lives in the Ventanas community in the province of Los Ríos. She has three children.
 
Members of the VRC LA UNION group, located in the Aguas Frías area in the Ventanas community, work in short-cycle farming, sowing corn, rice and beans. They have been working at this for a long time. 

Lucila has worked in farming for 15 years, specifically in sowing corn, rice and beans. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them at the Ventanas fair in the same area.

She is requesting a loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for the crops. With the support of this loan, she would have financial help with meeting her basic needs. There are challenges to be faced such as pests and diseases and the changes in climate. It is her dream to build her own home.
She likes to go out with her family.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Las Vecinas Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Odelia es la líder del grupo vive en una casa en alquiler hace varios años en la zona de Chacacollo,  sus hijos ya no dependen de ella, su esposo es electricista y la Sra. Tiene como actividad una tienda donde vende material de costruccion mas especificamente piso de parquets actividad donde le va muy bien, están trabajando ambos  con la ilusión  de poder  ahorrar para comprar un terreno y así poder tener su propia casa el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de material  para surtir su tienda y de esta manera incrementar su mercaderia.
El  grupo esta conformado por vecinas y amigas de muchos años .las otras dos clientes viven en la casa de sus padres y cada una de ellas tienen  actividad propia: venta de comida , destinaran su crédito para incrementar su mercadería .
texts.en: Mrs. Odelia is the leader of this group. She has lived in a rented house for many years in the area of Chacacollo. Her children do not depend on her anymore. Her husband is an electrician, and Mrs. Odelia has a store where she sells construction materials, including parquet floors. Her business is going well, and she is working with the goal of saving enough money to buy land so that she can have her own house. She will use the money from the loan to buy materials to supply her store. In this way, she will increase her merchandise. The group includes neighbors and long-time friends. The other two clients live in their parients’ house and each one of them has their own business, including selling food. They will use their loan to increase their merchandise.

loans.use: To buy parquet floors to increase her merchandise

loans.name: Edisson Rolando

texts.es:
Edisson Rolando S. S. tiene 29 años. Vive en Unión Libre  vive con la compañera y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Edisson se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 10 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es mejorar la casa.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Edisson Rolando S. S. is 29 years old. He lives with his partner and their children, in the Ventanas region, Province of Los Ríos. They have 3 children.

The members of the La Union rural communal bankare all based in the Aguas Frías area of Ventanas. The group is dedicated to agricultural work, in a  planting cycle of maize, rice and beans. This activity takes a lot of time. 

Edisson has been dedicated to agriculture - especially the cultivation of maize, rice and beans - for 10 years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his produce at the market in the same area. He is seeking a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for his crops. The loan should help him financially, to stock up on these necessities. He faces difficulties such as crop diseases and the variability of the climate. His dream is to improve his house. He likes to play sport.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Martin Beranio

texts.es:
Martin Beranio M. O. tiene 64 años. Es divorciado vive con los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 4 hijos.
 
Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Martin se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 20 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ahorrar para los hijos tengan su casa.
Le gusta pasar en la casa.
texts.en:
Martin Beranio M. O. is 64 years old. He is divorced and lives with his children, in the Ventanas region, Province of Los Ríos. He has 4 children.

The members of the La Union rural communal bank are all based in the Aguas Frías area of Ventanas. The group is dedicated to agricultural work, in a planting cycle of maize, rice and beans. This activity takes a lot of time.

Martin has been dedicated to agriculture - especially the cultivation of maize, rice and beans - for 20 years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his produce at the market in the same area. He is seeking a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for his crops. The loan should help him financially, to stock up on these necessities. He faces difficulties such as crop diseases and the variability of the climate. His dream is to save up so that his children may have the house. He likes to spend time at home.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es: Elisa tiene 37 años, vive  con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Ella ofrece el servicio de renovación de muebles y tapizados de sillones, pero desde hace 3 años empezó a fabricar roperos, comoda, en donde su esposo es quien arma y crea estos muebles. Es así que Elisa es la encargada de buscar nuevos clientes, en donde utiliza un conjunto de muestras de telas y tapizados para que el cliente elija, además con un catálogo en mano, muestra los diversos diseños de muebles que pueden hacer. Su taller se encuentra ubicado en el interior de su casa, aquí es donde fabrica los muebles, que el cliente elija, las calidades y tipo del trabajo definen el precio del servicio que ofrecen, pero por el buen trabajo que realiza, han hecho que gane más clientes. Adicionalmente a esta actividad, también ofrece el servicio de cosmetología, en donde sus clientes son sus vecinas. En adelante  desea implementar el taller de muebles con mayor cantidad de herramientas, abastecerse de nuevos diseños de telas, asimismo desea tener un salón de belleza. Es el crédito número 2 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de telas para seguir tapizando, así como también en mejorar sus negocio de cosmetología porque desea comprar nuevas herramientas como tijeras, ruleros, secadora, entre otros artefactos.
texts.en:
Elisa, age 37, lives with her husband and 2 children in their own house. 

She offers a furniture renovation and re-upholstery service, but 3 years ago she started making wardrobes, alongside her husband, who creates and assembles furniture. In this way, Elisa became in charge of finding new customers. To do this she uses a selection of demonstration fabrics for the client to choose from. With a catalogue in hand, she shows them the many different designs she and her husband can make. Her workshop is located in their house, and this is where the furniture is made and the customers choose. The quality and the style determine the price of the service, but becasue of the fair prices they charge they have earned many customers. As well as this activity, Elisa also offers a beauty therapy service to her neighbours. 

Going forward, she would like to improve the furniture workshop with more tools, and stock up on new designs of upholstery fabric. She would also like to open a beauty salon. This is her second loan from [field partner] MF. She is happy knowing that she can access financial support, and is grateful to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible people who support one another. She is grateful also to all the people who will be her lenders, because the loan will be very useful in developing her business further. With the loan, she will invest in buying fabrics to carry on with the upholstery, and it will also improve her beauty therapy business because she wants to buy new tools such as scissors, rollers and a dryer, among other things.

loans.use: To buy fabric for upholstering funiture, and at the same time buy things to continue her work in beauty therapy

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy products for a hardware store and a grocery store

loans.name: Christian Roberto

texts.es:
Christian Roberto V. C. tiene 20 años. Es soltero  vive con un hermano y un tio, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No Tiene hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Christian se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una casa.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Christian Roberto V. C. is 20 years old. He is single and lives with his brother and his uncle, in the Ventanas region, Province of Los Ríos. He has no children.

The members of the La Union rural communal bank are all based in the Aguas Frías area of Ventanas. The group is dedicated to agricultural work, in a planting cycle of maize, rice and beans. This activity takes a lot of time.

Christian has been dedicated to agriculture - especially the cultivation of maize, rice and beans - for 3 years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his produce at the market in the same area. He is seeking a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for his crops. The loan should help him financially, to stock up on these necessities. He faces difficulties such as crop diseases and the variability of the climate. His dream is to have his own house. He likes to play sport.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos C. C. tiene 29 años. Vive en Unión Libre con la compañera y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar carro.
Le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos C. C. is 29 years old. He lives with his partner and their children, in the Ventanas region, Province of Los Ríos. They have 2 children.

The members of the La Union rural communal bank are all based in the Aguas Frías area of Ventanas. The group is dedicated to agricultural work, in a planting cycle of maize, rice and beans. This activity takes a lot of time.

Edisson has been dedicated to agriculture - especially the cultivation of maize, rice and beans - for 3years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his produce at the market in the same area. He is seeking a loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for his crops. The loan should help him financially, to stock up on these necessities. He faces difficulties such as crop diseases and the variability of the climate. His dream is to buy a car. He likes to relax.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Eulalia Margarita

texts.es:
Eulalia de 44 años, tiene una tienda de víveres. Vive con sus dos hijos de 15 y 16 años en una zona urbana llamada suburbio de Guayaquil y caracterizada porque la mayoría de habitantes son comerciantes. 

Por la edad que tiene no tenia oportunidades de trabajar en una empresa por eso empezó a comprar víveres para tener su propia tienda en la parte delantera de su casa. En la actualidad tiene ya 6 años con su tienda vende todo tipo de víveres de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, bebidas, enlatados. Trabaja en su tienda desde las 06h00am hasta las 21h00pm sola. 

Con el préstamo ella tiene pensado comprar víveres como aceite, detergentes, bebidas y otros para surtir su tienda. En el futuro quiere tener un minimarket ya que la competencia de otras tiendas por el sector es mínima y ella quiere obtener más demanda con la desventajas que ellas tienen.
texts.en:
Eulalia, age 44, has a grocery store. She lives with her 2 children, age 15 and 16 years old, in an urban area, although it is called a suburb of Guayaquil. The area is characterized by the large proportion of its inhabitants who have their own businesses. 

Because of her age, Eulalia didn't have the opportunity to go work for a company, and therefore started buying up groceries to start her own shop in the front part of her house. Now she has had her shop for 6 years, and sells all sorts of groceries - staples such as rice, sugar, drinks, and canned foods. She works by herself in her shop, from 6am until 9pm.

With the loan she has decided to buy groceries such as cooking oil, cleaning products, drinks and other items to stock her store. In the future she wants to have a minimarket, because local competition from other shops in the same sector is minimal and she wants to increase demand for her store by making the most of the advantages she has over the others.

loans.use: Cooking oil, cleaning products, drinks.

loans.name: Nana Esi

texts.en:
Nana Esi K. sells toys and stationary in Elmina. She has been in this trade for twelve years. Her loan will be used to buy more stationary and toys to sell. She hopes build a shop from her additional income.

She is married and has six dependents. Her husband works as a library assistant. She assists her husband in paying school fees and utility bills.

loans.use: to buy more stationary and toys to sell

loans.name: Vida

texts.en:
Vida A. cooks yam and serves it with palava sauce. She also sells cosmetics in Elmina. Vida will use the loan to purchase yams and other ingredients to prepare food for sale. With the new profits from her expanded business, Vida plans to build a house.

Vida is married and has four children. Her husband is a farmer. Vida uses her income to assist her husband in providing her family with their basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase yams and other ingredients to prepare food for sale.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua K. is married and has four children. Ekua has been selling provisions and drinks in Elmina for four years. Her husband is a steel bender. Ekua uses her income to assist her husband in feeding and educating her children. Ekua will use this loan to purchase more provisions and drinks to meet the needs of her customers. With the new profits from her expanded business, Ekua plans to buy land.

loans.use: to purchase more provisions and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy groceries and cleaning products

loans.name: Fe Y Amor 2 Group

texts.en:
Louise is the coordinator of her group Fe y Amor 2 (Love and Faith 2), a group of Haitian emigrants. She is a divorced mom and makes her home here in a simple structure with a child. She says that her most difficult challenges are to work hard and return to Haiti, where her family lives. In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying attending church and sharing with friends.

Louise is excited to be taking her 6th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She has been operating her business for more than 5 years, starting with some savings. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying flour, butter, oil, charcoal and other items. She will use the profits to save and plan her future, while she dreams to return to Haiti.

This Esperanza associate began with us because of the opportunity to get loans, even as a foreigner. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, butter, etc.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua K. displays groceries for sale on a table in Elmina.  She is divorced and has four children. She is responsible for providing the family with its basic needs. She will use this loan to acquire more groceries for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to further her children's education.

loans.use: to acquire more groceries for sale

loans.name: Rani's Group

texts.en:
Rani lives in a small city in Pakistan called Kasur which is located in Punjab, Pakistan and famous for its tanneries industry. She lives there in a 3 room brick house with her family in the area named Basti baraat shah. She moved here after her marriage.  She is a caring lady, carrying out her responsibilities of a housewife but she also supporting her family financially by sewing clothes for her neighboring clients.  

Her husband has a business of selling construction supplies. He makes contracts with different construction companies and provides them the supplies at a good profit. 

Rani has given birth to 5 sons and 2 daughters. Her eldest son works along with his father while her other children are getting their education from a local school. 

Rani has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy more construction supplies such as cement, sand and bricks and improve his business.  He has been doing this business for over 10 years and Rani is hopeful that by investing with this loan, his business will grow further and makes him more profits. 

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 3rd loan application. She has maintained a good credit record in previous loan years.

loans.use: To buy supplies for a construction supplies selling business

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca tiene 47 años, vive con sus 2 hijos en casa heredada D. sus familiares. DesD. hace 6 años se dedica a la compra y venta D. animales, principalmente comercializa ovejas y cerdos, que son llevados a vender los fines D. semana en las ferias ganadera D. su comunidad. En ocasiones, sus hijos la apoyan en esta tarea ganadera, ya sea en la alimentación como en el aseo D. estos animales. Disfruta mucho realizar este trabajo, porque le resulta más rentable que otras actividades. Ahora su prioridad es tener mayor cantidad D. animales para incrementar su capital D. trabajo. Es el crédito número 5 con MFP, esta muy contenta D.  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso D. su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. más animales como ovejas y cerdos.
texts.en: Francisca, age 47, lives with her 2 children in the house she inherited from her family. For the past 6 years she has been buying and selling livestock, principally sheep and pigs, which are taken each weekend to sell in the local livestock markets. Sometimes her children help her with this task, as well as with feeding and cleaning out the animals. She really enjoys her work, becasue it is more profitable than other activities. Her priority now is to increase the number of animals, so as to increase her working capital. This is her 5th loan from [field partner] MFP. She is happy to know that she has this financial backing, and is grateful that she is part of her communal bank, because all its members are responsible people who support one another. She is grateful also to all the people who will be her lenders, because the loan will be very useful in developing her business further. With the loan, she will invest in the purchase of more sheep and pigs.

loans.use: To buy sheep and pigs

loans.name: Salem

texts.en: Salem is 32 years old, living and working in Barja, el Chouf, Lebanon. He is asking for a loan of $1500 to buy some cows and goats for butchering and selling. He has his own butcher shop and 14 years of experience in the trade. Salem is extremely popular with his customers, maintaining a very clean shop. He hopes to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy cows and goats

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa M. is a single parent taking care of one child. She has been cooking rice for sale in Elmina for six years. Her husband is a mason. Adjoa uses her income to see to the well-being of her home. Adjoa will use the loan to purchase extra bags of rice and other ingredient to cook to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Adjoa plans to build a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase extra bags of rice and other ingredients

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua A. is divorced. She has been selling provisions in Elmina for four years. Efua uses her income to take care of her home. She will use this loan to purchase more provisions to fill her shop and to resell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Efua plans to build another shop.

loans.use: to purchase more provisions

loans.name: Auntie Emma

texts.en: Auntie Emma K. sells both children's and adults' slippers. She also sells casssava in Elmina. She is married and lives with her two children. Her husband is a prison officer. She assists her husband in paying the utility bills and the children's school fees. Her loan will be used to buy more slippers for resale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy land.

loans.use: to buy more slippers.

loans.name: Bokk Jom 4 Group

texts.fr: Bokk Jom 4 est un groupe de 5 femmes qui  vivent dans la localité de Bambilor. Elles s’activent  dans le commerce de diverses marchandises depuis plus de 10ans.  Elles ont choisi l’activité de commerce pour lutter contre l’oisiveté et pouvoir gagner leur vie. Ainsi avec leurs gains elles parviennent à satisfaire leurs petits besoins. Elles  empruntent  un montant de 500000 frs dans le but de renforcer leur fond de roulement  et développer leur activité de commerce.
texts.en:
Bokk Jom 4 is a group of five women who live in Bambilor. They have been in business selling diverse merchandise for more than ten years. They chose sales as their business in order to stay active and be able to earn a living. Thus, with their profits they are able to meet their minor daily expenses. 

They are borrowing the sum of 500,000 francs with the goal of boosting their working capital and expanding their sales business.

loans.use: Boost working capital

loans.name: Vianey

texts.es:
Vianey F. C., tiene la edad de 29 años, está en unión libre y tiene 2 hijos  que son su mayor prioridad. Ella quiere comprar o invertir en productos para abastecer su salón de belleza de una forma más amplia y productos de buena calidad,  ella cuenta con una amplia experiencia, por lo cual no quiere dejar perder ese pequeño negocio que tanto le ha costado hacer. Con ésta opción  ella pretende mejorar su nivel de  vida y a su vez ir generando la ganancias para poder seguir hacia adelante con su negocio, también ofrecerle a sus clientes todos los productos que sean necesarios y de muy buena calidad. A su vez ella piensa en el futuro de su hijos y poderles dar estudios para que en un futuro sea unos buenos profesionales.
Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Vianey F. C., age 29, lives with her partner and their 2 children, who are her main priority. 

She wants to invest in products to stock her beauty salon, so that she has more choice and good quality products. She counts on providing a good experience, becaue she would not want to lose her little business after all that she has put into it. With it, she hopes to improve her standard of living and go on generating income, which in turn will enable her to keep improving the business, offering clients all the high quality products they need. At the same time, she is thinking of her children's future and wants to be able to pay for their studies so that they can grow up to be good professional people.

This is her first loan with [field partner] FUDECOSUR. She has not had other loans from state banks before either, but FUDECOSUR has offered er the loan with good terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: Productos para un Salon de belleza

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa S. is divorced and lives with her five dependents. Adjoa is a hairdresser in Elmina. She has been in this trade for eight years and uses her income to see to the well-being of her family. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase more hair products to use in the salon. With the new profits from her expanded business, Adjoa plans to put up a shop.

loans.use: to purchase more hair products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy both perishable and nonperishable items used for food preparation.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua G. has been selling charcoal in Elmina for 8 years. She is divorced and is responsible for the general upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy more bags of charcoal for resale. She hopes to expand her business with the new profit.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Ramzana's Group

texts.en:
Ramzana is a resident of Kasur which is a small city located in Punjab province of Pakistan and famous for its tanneries industry. She lives there in the area named Basti baraat shah with her family in a 3 room brick house. She came here after her marriage with N. A. who is a black smith by profession. He also provides welding services to his customers. 

Ramzana supports her family financially by doing embroidery work. She learned this art before her marriage from her mother and now this skill gives hera  reward in a form of money. She has 2 daughters and a son. Her elder daughter is studying while others are very young and have not started attending school yet. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to improve her embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy clothes, and embroider material such as beads, colored thread and sketches in bulk quantity that will help her fulfill orders on time and to offer more embroidery variety to her clients. She started this business for some time ago and she is confident that her business will flourish after a loan investment. 

She is a new loan user of Asasah and this is her first loan application. She hopes it will be a good experience for her in improving her business.

loans.use: To buy clothes and material for embroidery business

loans.name: El Mirador De Acambay Group

texts.es:
ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA EL MIRADOR DE ACAMBAY PORQUE DESDE DONDE ESTA EL GRUPO TIENE UNA HERMOSA VISTA, ESTÁ UBICADO EN UNA COMUNIDAD DEL MUNICIPIO DE ACAMBAY EN EL ESTADO DE MEXICO.

EL GRUPO ESTÁ CONFORMADO POR 10 INTEGRANTES .

LA SEÑORA FIDELINA P. P. TIENE ESTUDIOS DE SECUNDARIA, ES COMERCIANTE Y TIENE UNA HIJA. ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE CHICHARRON , TIENE 8 AÑOS QUE INICIO SU NEGOCIO EN ACAMBAY.
SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE GAS, CARNE PARA LOS CHICHARRONES, YA QUE LA GENTE CONSIDERA QUE ES UN PRODUCTO MUY SABROSO COMPARADO CON LA COMPETENCIA. AL MOMENTO DE SOLICITAR EL CREDITO SE SIENTE MUY SEGURA DE SACAR EL PRESTAMO ADELANTE ADEMAS DE PODER VENEFICIAR A MUCHAS PERSONAS ESPECIALMENTE A SU HIJA YA QUE EL DESTINO FINAL DE TODO SU TRABAJO ES ELLA , EN UN FUTURO SE VISUALIZA COMO UNA EMPRESARIA DE EXITO EL CUAL ESPERA CONSEGUIR CON LA AYUDA DE PRESTAMOS.
texts.en:
This group is called “El Mirador de Acamba” (The Viewpoint of Acamba) because from where they are the group has a beautiful view.  It is located in a community in the municipality of Acamba in the state of Mexico.  

The group is made up of 10 members.

Fidelina P. P. attended school through secondary school.  She is a businesswoman and has a daughter.  She sells chicharrón (fried pork rinds).  She started this business in Acamba eight years ago and is requesting the loan to purchase propane gas and meat for the chicharrón as people consider hers to be a very tasty product compared with the competition.  At this time as she is requesting the loan, she feels very sure that she will get ahead with the loan and also that it will benefit many people, especially her daughter as the final destination of all of her work is her daughter.  In the future she sees herself as a successful businesswoman, which she hopes to achieve with the help of loans.

loans.use: To invest in her business

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa A. sells Fante kenkey (fermented corn dough wrapped in corn or banana leaves) in Elmina. She is divorced, has four children and is responsible for the well-being of her home. Her loan will be used to buy more maize to prepare kenkey for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more maize to prepare kenkey for sale.

loans.name: Unidos Venceremos 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Ninita is the coordinator of her group Unidos Venceremos 3 & 4 (Unite to Win), a group of Haitians emigrants. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and five children. She says that her most difficult challenge is to finish building her house. In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying attending church. 

Louise is excited to be taking her fifth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for more than 25 years, starting with some savings. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying dozens of pants, shirts, skirts, t-shirts and other items. She will use the profits to buy building materials for her house, while she dreams to improve her business and to live safely.

This Esperanza associate began with us because of the opportunity to have loans, even though they are foreigners. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominates the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water, none of which is potable.

loans.use: To buy clothes (pants, shirts, skirts, etc.)

loans.name: Omar

texts.fr: Monsieur Omar D. est âgé de 35 ans. Il habite dans la localité de Yoff. Il est marié et père de 2 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 2 et 4 ans. Monsieur  D. exerce depuis plus de 10 ans la vente d’habits pour hommes. Dans les années 1990 il a pratiqué l’activité de tailleur. Actuellement en plus de son commerce d’habits il s’adonne périodiquement à la vente de céréales comme le mil, le blé, une fois dans la saison. Il a choisi l’activité de vente d’habits par passion et sur proposition de ses parents. Son but est de réaliser des bénéfices et gagner sa vie. Il est membre de la caisse de Yoff depuis octobre 2007. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de céréales en vue de renouveler son commerce saisonnier. Son objectif est d’accroitre ses revenus et améliorer la situation de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Omar D. is 35 years old and lives in Yoff. He is married and the father of two children between 2 and 4 years old. Mr. D. has been selling men's clothing for more than ten years. In the 1990s he worked as a tailor. Currently, in addition to his clothing business, he periodically (once each season) sells cereals such as millet and wheat.

He chose the clothing business because of his passion for it and also because his parents proposed it. His goal is to make a profit and earn his living. 

He has been a member of the Yoff branch of UIMCEC since October 2007. He is seeking a loan of 500,000 francs to be used to buy cereals in order to renew his seasonal commerce. His objective is to increase his income and better his family's situation.

loans.use: Purchase of cereals

loans.name: Sakina's Group

texts.en:
Sakina is 46 years old and does embroidery work to earn money for her family. She started this business to financially support her husband who is a painter and paints on houses and buildings on contract basis. He makes contracts with house and building owners and provides them with his painting services.  

She has 5 sons and a daughter. He three elder sons also do embroidery work. They learned this art from their mother and operate a shop in the market. Her 2 younger sons are studying while her daughter stays at home. She is illiterate and didn’t get an education. She  also spends her time managing the household chores. 
 
Sakina has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the improvement of her embroidery business. With the loan she will buy an embroidery machine which will help her finish her work in less time and make more money.  She has been doing this business for past 6 years and she is confident that a loan investment will give a big boost to her business.  

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 4th loan application. She has maintained a good credit behavior in previous loan years.

loans.use: To buy an embroidery machine for her business

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. V. tiene 3 años vendiendo ropa y zapatos usados ella empezo con ropa que le mandaban sus familiares en Estadas Unidos de América, al ver que era productivo empezó a comprar mercancía en dicho país para revender aquí, su esposo cuenta con un taller de soldadora ubicado en su domicilio el tiene mas de 20 años con dicha profesión el comenta que en años atrás el taller era mas productivo pero que ultimamente si han bajado las ventas, es por eso que su esposo tuvo que iyectarle por otro lado capital a la familia, el crédito lo requiere para comprar más mercancía y agrandar sus ventas aprovechando la temporada de invierno.
texts.en: Ms. V. has been selling used clothing and shoes for three years.  She started with clothing that her relatives sent to her from the United States and upon seeing that it was productive, she started to buy merchandise there to sell in her country.  Her husband has a welding workshop located in their house and has been in the profession for more than 20 years.  He says that in previous years, it was more productive but sales have gone down recently.  This is why his wife had to bring capital to the family through a different means.  She needs the loan to buy more merchandise and increase her sales, taking advantage of the winter season.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her business

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana M. C. es un microempresaria  en el área de turismo, en la Palma de Puerto Jimenez en el Sur del País. 
En este momento ella necesita un préstamo de ₡400 000 (Cuatrocientos  mil colones) para la reparación de uno de los autobuses que utiliza para transportar a los turistas. De esta manera podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y hacer crecer su empresita.
Ella es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal  Raíces Capitales, una de las más de 100 organizaciones  socias de EDESA.
texts.en:
Luisa M. C. is a small business owner in the area of tourism in La Palma de Puerto Jimenez, located in the southern part of the country.

At this time, she needs a loan of 400,000 Costa Rican Colones (CRC) to repair one of the buses that she uses to transport the tourists.  This way, she will be able to offer better service to her customers and help her small business grow.

She is a member of the Raíces Capitales Communal Credit Enterprise, one of the more than 100 member organizations that make up EDESA.

loans.use: To repair a tourist bus

loans.name: Zaragoza

texts.es: El Sr. M. es un hombre muy trabajador y honrado dice que ya tiene mas de 20 años de profecion carpintero desde chico le gustaba mucho hacer pequeños detalles de madera y conforme paso el tiempo empezo a mejorar es una profesion heredada por su padre. el siempre ha estado al tanto de la educacion de sus hijos y con gran esfuerzo los ha sacado adelante, en este momento solo la mas chica estudia en preparatoria con la ayuda de su esposa ha sobrellevado esta ultima crisis economica, poco a poco se ha hido levantando el dinero lo quiere para comprar materia prima para su negocio.
texts.en: Mr. M. is a very hard-working and noble man. He states that he has been a carpenter for over 20 years. As a young boy, he really liked making little wooden products, and as time progressed, he started to improve his skills, which he learned from his father. He has always been on top of his children's studies, and after much effort, he has been able to push them forward. At this time, only the youngest is in high school. With the help of his wife, he has been able to withstand this last financial crisis. Little by little, money has been coming in. He needs the loan in order to purchase raw materials for his business.

loans.use: Purchase materials for his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase plants wholesale

loans.name: Duo Solidario Los Guachipilines Group

texts.es: Duo Solidario los Guachipilines                                                                                                                   Con la venta de consumo diario, doña Patricia, comparte que vio hace años la oportunidad de dedicarse a asta actividad ya que solo existía una tienda en el centro de  localidad, inicio solo con la venta de café, azúcar, maíz, a la fecha le va muy bien ofrece varios productos a su clientela, su sueño es llegar a tener una abarrotería, donde sus servicios sean mejores, y no tener que decirle NO hay a sus clientes, es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de productos comestibles para su tienda y doña Florentina  J. quien vende ropa variada, dice que abrió su negocio gracias a un ahorro que ella y su esposo lograron a través del cultivo de peras, manzanilla y melocotón. Gracias a sus ventas ella solicito un crédito a FAPE, con el cual vario y surtió más  en su producto, ha tenido mucha demanda,  ve la necesidad de solicitar un crédito mas para seguir Comprando ropa variada y a seguir ayudando, en la educación, alimentación y en mejor vida para sus niños quienes tienen un futuro por delante.
texts.en:
Mrs. Patricia, a member of the ‘Duo Solidario los Guachipilines’, shared that several years ago she saw the opportunity to open a store in the center of her town since there was only one store in that area. She started selling coffee, sugar and corn and now sells a variety of products. 
 
Her dream is to have a well-stocked grocery store where she will not have to tell her costumers, “No, I don’t have…”. She is requesting the loan to buy more products for the store.
 
Mrs. Florentina J., who sells clothing, told us that she opened her business with savings she and her husband had from the sales of pears, apples and peaches. She requested a loan from FAPE and used it to stock her store. Her clothing has been in good demand, so she is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise. This would allow her to continue helping with her children’s education and feeding and improving their lives because they have the future ahead of them.

loans.use: To buy food products and clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay for computer repairs & purchase a printer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: leather, soles

loans.name: Cruz De Cantera Group

texts.es:
Este grupo adoptó el nombre de cruz de cantera, dado que frente al negocio donde son las reuniones hay una cruz de cantera que tiene aproximadamente 100 años, es un signo distintivo de la región ademas de otros emblemas que distinguen al Municipio de Aculco considerado como un “Pueblo Mágico”, el grupo se ubica en el Estado de México y está conformado por 10 personas.

La sra. Aurelia G.  es la tesorera del grupo, tiene 36 años de edad, estudió la primaria, tiene un hijo, y se dedica ala venta de tortillas desde hace 7 años. Solicita el prestamo para la compra de maiz a menor costo porque en esta temporada de cosecha en la región el precio del maiz disminuye, es una estrategia que ha utilizado y le ha dado buenos resultados. La opinión de sus clientes es de que es un buen producto y que tiene un toque especial por ello consumen el producto, reparte a domicilio a las comunidades aledañas, tambien cuenta con clientes del estado de Queretaro (le consumen cada 8 dias) y clientes del estado de Puebla (le consumen cada 15 dias). Ella inicio vendiendo tortillas en su domicilio, repartiendo su producto en una bicicleta; con su arduo trabajo posteriormente compro un vehiculo que le facilito aun más las entregas (hace 5 años).
Al solicitar el prestamo la señora siente segura de poder salir adelante, además de contar con el apoyo moral de sus compañeras. En un futuro no muy lejano ella piensa adquirir un terreno con base a su trabajo y el apoyo de los presamistas.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Cruz de Cantera' (Stone Cross) because opposite the business where the group meetings take place there is a stone cross which is approximately 100 years old.  It is a symbol of the region along with other symbols which characterize the town of Aculco which is considered a “Pueblo Mágico” (Magic Town).  The group is located in the State of Mexico and has 10 members.

Aurelia G. is the group's treasurer.  She is 36 years old and completed her primary education.  She has one child and has been selling tortillas for 7 years.  She is requesting this loan to buy corn at a lower price because during this harvest season in the region, the price of corn falls.  It is a strategy which she has used in the past and it has had good results.

Her customers believe that Aurelia's product is good and has that special touch.  This is why they consume her product.  Aurelia delivers to people's homes in neighboring communities.  She also has customers in the State of Queretaro (who consume her product every week) and in the State of Puebla (who consume her product every fortnight).  Aurelia started selling tortillas from her home, delivering her product on a bicycle.  Through a lot of hard work she managed to buy a vehicle 5 years ago which has helped her a lot with her deliveries.

At the moment of requesting her loan, Aurelia feels sure that she can get ahead in life with the moral support of her fellow group members.  In the not-so-distant future, she would like to acquire a plot of land through her hard work and the support of her lenders.

loans.use: To buy corn to make tortillas

loans.name: Natalya

texts.en:
Natalya is a widow. She lives in Berdichev with her daughter and son-in-law. Natalya is a small-market entrepreneur selling women’s clothing items, i.e. dresses, skirts, jackets and sweaters, in the central market of her hometown. She started this business in 2000. Currently, Natalya’s working capital amounts to 37,000 Grivnyas. Her net profit is 8,700 Grivnyas a month.  

Natalya is requesting a loan of 12,000 Grivnyas to increase her turnover capital and purchase winter merchandise. She believes re-stocking her inventory will help her attract more customers and increase her sales as a result. The business is the only source of income for the family. Natalya’s further business goals are to continue growing her business, adding new vending locations and thus winning new customers.

loans.use: To increase her turnover capital

loans.name: Celestino
