texts.es: El sr. Celestino E. L. es una persona honrada y muy trabajadora el tiene una tienda de abarrotes  el se hace cargo de su tienda, el sr. Celestino esta divorciado y el tiene dos hijos de los cuales el les ayuda a veces de acuerdo a sus posibilidades, el quiere el dinero para surtir mas su mercancia y asi poder brindarle mayor satisfaccion y alegria al cliente ya que su mayor alegria es ver a la gente contenta, el es una persona muy respetada por su gente.
texts.en:
Sr. Celestino E. L. is an honest and hardworking gentleman who manages his own store. He is divorced and has two children who occasionally help whenever they can.

Celestino needs this loan so that he can stock his store with more merchandise, thereby providing satisfaction and joy to his customers. His greatest thrill is to see people happy. Celestino is well-respected by other people.

loans.use: Acquire more merchandise for his business

loans.name: Grupo Unido 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Moraima is the coordinator of her group Grupo Unido 1 & 2 (United Group). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her parents. She says that her most difficult challenge is to have a partner or a husband. In the meantime she plans to continue enjoying the kitchen. She likes to cook; that's why her business is a place where you can find different and good dishes.

Moraima is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for about five years, starting with savings. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying vegetables, meats, rice, flour, oil, etc. She will use the profits to invest in her business. 

This associate began with Esperanza because she heard about the loan and found it very attractive as some of her friends are doing business with this loan. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti.  Her group is located in Puerto Plata, a port town on the north coast where the economy is based on tourism. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water, none of which is potable.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, meats, rice, flour, oil, etc.

loans.name: Jesus Andres

texts.es: El sr. Jesus Javier necesita el dinero para poner su piso en el patio ya que su esposa esta embarazada y ya se ah caido dos veces en el patio debido a que no tiene piso tiene, una parte pero le falta completar lo demas el señor Jesus necesita proteger a su esposa para que no le pase nada ya que se ah asustado ya que tiene miedo que su esposa pueda perder a su bebe, por eso el quiere proteger tanto a su hijo como a su familia, el señor Jesus es una persona muy reponsable y muy trabajador.
texts.en: Sr. Jesus Javier needs the money to put the floor in his yard, as his wife is pregnant and has already fallen twice in the yard because it has no floor.  One part is incomplete, and Sr. Jesus needs to protect his wife so that nothing happens.  He is afraid that his wife may lose her baby, so he wants to protect both his children and his family.  Sr. Jesus is a very responsible persona and very hardworking.

loans.use: Poner piso en su patio.

loans.name: Emiliya

texts.en:
Emiliya is married with a grown daughter, Valeriya. She is an entrepreneur from Berdichev. Emiliya sells children’s toys in the central marketplace of her hometown. She offers a nice selection of toys for different age groups at affordable prices. Emiliya has been in the trade since 1995. Presently, she has 32,000 Grivnyas in turnover capital. 

This holiday season, Emiliya is seeking a loan of 10,000 Grivnyas to purchase additional seasonal merchandise, i.e. imitation Christmas trees, garlands and decorations, as well as stuffed toys and electronic games that always sell well before Christmas and New Year’s. Emiliya uses the profit generated to pay her daughter’s college fees. However, one day, she is hoping to expand her business by investing her profits in opening a children’s toy store and a café with a playground for little customers.

loans.use: To increase her turnover capital

loans.name: Abida's Group

texts.en:
Abida lives in a small city in Punjab Pakistan called Kasur. Kasur is famous for its tannery industry. She lives in a 3-room brick house with her family in an area named Basti Baraat Shah. She moved there after her marriage. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He provides passenger transportation and generates income for the family. 
 
She is a talented lady who sews clothing. She is famous in her region for her high quality work. She sews clothes with perfect measurements. In her six years of working experience, she has never received any complaints from her customers about her work. She receives sewing orders from her neighbors and clients, fulfills their sewing orders on time, and earns a good income.

Abida is the mother of two children, a daughter and a son. Her son attends school, but her daughter is only 4 years old and has not yet started attending school.
 
Abida has applied for a loan from Asasah, a Kiva field partner, for her sewing business. With the loan, she will buy an electric sewing machine that will help her do her work better and finish the orders on time. She is very confident that her business will growth well after the loan investment and, as a result, she will be able to provide better living conditions for her family. 
 
She is a new loan user of Asasah and hopes it will be a profitable experience for her.

loans.use: To buy an electric sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Zara

texts.fr: Zara a 30 ans et est mariée. Elle a en sa charge 5 enfants. Elle est née à Tchamba et vit à Lomé. En effet, pour aider au foyer, elle exerce comme activité la vente du jus et compte dans cette activité près de 10 ans. Elle achète les produits de fabrication au grand marché de Lomé et revient transformé en jus. Ensuite, elle revend les produits finis au marché hedzranawoe. Le crédit demandé permettra d’acheter les nécessaires de fabricatdu jus pour pouvoir faire face à la demande sans cesse croissante.
texts.en: Zara is 30 years old and married. She has five children in her care. She was born in Tchamba and lives in Lomé. In order to help the household she has a juice selling business and has nearly 10 years experience in this business. She buys her basic ingredients at the large market in Lomé and then transforms them into juice. Afterwards, she sells the finished product at the market in Hedzranawoe. The loan she has asked for will allow her to buy the necessary ingredients to make juice, so that she can face ever increasing demand.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients for making juice

loans.name: Duo Silidario Kayros De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
DUO  SOLIDARIO KAYROS DE SAN BARTOLO
La señora Nohelia Haydee, 20 años  quien se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles , nos comenta que su negocio existe gracias a la liquidación  salarial que ella  y su esposo recibieron  en una empresa donde trabajaban  cuando tenía 15 años, y por políticas uno de los dos tenía que retirarse, los dos decidieron retirarse, y  es así como ellos emprendieron con este negocio,  y tienen el anhelo de seguir invirtiendo pues le ha ido bien, pero requieren de mas capital, por eso solicita este crédito para la compra de productos comestibles   su hermana  la señora Shirley  quien se dedica a la venta de refacciones, dice que inicio con la venta de frijol preparado, volteados,  por lo que ella necesita de capital, por eso solicita este crédito para comprar productos comestibles por mayor para elaborar comida , teniendo así un mejor ingreso con la que colabora al sustento de su hogar.
texts.en:
DUO  SOLIDARIO KAYROS DE SAN BARTOLO 
20-year old Señora Nohelia Haydee sells groceries. She bought the business with the settlement she and her husband received from the company where she had worked since she was 15 years old. For political reasons one of them had to leave, so they both decided to leave, and that’s when they started the business. Their greatest wish is to continue building the business as it has done well, but they need more capital. For this reason Nohelia is seeking a loan to buy more stock. 

Her sister Señora Shirley sells snacks. She explains that she is starting out by selling refried bean dishes, but she needs a loan to buy the ingredients at wholesale prices. This way she will have more income and be able to contribute to household expenses.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Charifatou

texts.fr: Charifatou a 33 ans et est mariée. Elle est née à Sokodé et vit à Lomé.   Elle contribue au ménage et fait le commerce de pagne et bijoux. Dans cette activité, elle  cumule 6 ans d’expérience. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé et revend à la devanture de sa maison. L’objet de ce prêt sera essentiellement destiné à l’achat de nouveaux lots de pagnes et bijoux pour accroitre son commerce.
texts.en: Charifatou is 33 years old and married. She was born in Sokodé and lives in Lomé. She contributes to the household expenses and has a business selling "pagnes" (pieces of highly colourful fabric) and jewelry. She has six years' experience in this activity. She gets her supplies at the large market in Lomé and resells them in front of her house. The purpose of this loan is to buy new batches of "pagnes" and jewelry in order to expand her business.

loans.use: Purchase of "pagnes" and jewelry

loans.name: Activos De Santa Fe 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Ana is the coordinator of her group Activos de Santa Fe 1, 2 & 3 (Active from Santa Fe) and Santa Fe is their community´s name. Ana makes her home here in a simple structure with her long term partner and 2 children. She says that her most difficult challenges are to settle in a foreign country and to fight with change. In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying to eat.

Ana is excited to be taking her 4th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for 10 years, starting by selling clothes and shoes. She operates a colmado, a convenience store, in her neighborhood. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying rice, flour and other foods. She will use the profits to invest in her business. 

This Esperanza associate began with us because she needed capital for her business. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. Her group is located in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries. The main economic activities are free trading zone and a cement factory. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas in the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, flour, oil, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Flordesa

texts.es:
La señora Flordesa O. D. C. es casada tiene 40 años D. edad, apenas estudio hasta el nivel D. primario, tiene 1 hija. Flordesa vive con su esposo, tienen su vivienda en la zona D. Caico al sud oeste  D. la provincia Cercado del departamento D. Cochabamba. 

La señora Flordesa y su esposo se dedican a la producción D. leche cruda, toda su producción lechera entrega a un modulo lechero D. la zona, para su posterior recojo por parte D. PIL ANDINA. 
Las condiciones en las que viven son modestas, su vivienda cuenta con los servicios básicos, su ganado se cría en la misma propiedad. La señora Flordesa es una señora muy dedicada a su trabajo, pues ella su esposo y su hija se levantan muy temprano todos los días para orD.ñar las vacas. Y durante todo el día se dedican al cuidado D. las mimas, actividad en la que participa toda la familia. 
  
La señora Flordesa solicita el crédito para la adquisición D. alimento en general, ya que en esta época  escasea y sube considerablemente D. precio. Así mismo pueda mantener la producción D. leche D. manera que no bajen sus ingresos y estos se mantengan estables. El ideal que tiene la señora Flordesa es que por lo menos su hija termine D. estudiar y pueda  posteriormente alcanzar alguna profesión
texts.en:
Flordesa O. D. C. is married and is 40 years old. She has only an elementary education. She has one daughter. Flordesa lives with her husband. Their home is in the Caico zone in the Southwest of the Cercado province, in the Cochabamba department. Flordesa and her husband produce cruD. milk and sell all of their dairy products to a local dairy company to later be collected by PIL ANDINA [a Bolivian dairy company]. 
      They live in modest conditions; their home has basic services. Their farm is on the same property. Flordesa is a woman who is very dedicated to her work. She, her husband and their daughter all get up very early every day to take care of the cows, which they do all day-the whole family participates. Flordesa is requesting this loan to buy general food, since in this time of shortage the price has increased considerably. This way, she will be able to maintain milk production and not see a decrease in her income, so that her income will remain stable. Her dream is for her daughter to at least finish her studies and then achieve a profession.

loans.use: the purchase of food for her dairy farm

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy clothes wholesale; to buy food products

loans.name: Zeneyda Del Socorro

texts.es: Zeneyda tiene 27 años, su actividad es una pulpería, por lo que hace más de hace más 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad. Ella inicio ofreciendo golosinas en general, productos lácteos y gaseosas. Ha logrado obtener muy buenos resultados ya que ha logrado obtener muy buenos ingresos. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de jugos, granos básicos, pan, galletas entre otras cosas pues se acerca la época navideña y quiere tener de todo un poco, ya que las ganas de salir adelante las mantiene siempre. Su deseo es realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Zeneyda is 27 years old. She has run a small grocery store for over 10 years. She started out selling sweets, dairy products and fizzy drinks. She has had very good results and has made a good income. She is requesting a loan to use as working capital to purchase juices, basic grains, bread and biscuits, among other things, because the Christmas season is approaching and she wants to have a little bit of everything in stock. Her desire to improve her life always keeps her going. Her dream is to make improvements on her home.

loans.use: Purchase of juices, basic grains, bread and biscuits

loans.name: Benita Del Socorro

texts.es: Benita Del Socorro tiene 29 años, su actividad es la venta de comida. Hace más de 11 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido su principal fuente de ingreso. Benita alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de su establecimiento, por lo que tiene que realizar las actividades del hogar. Ella solicita el préstamo para implementar la compra de granos básicos, verduras, frutas, bolsas, cubiertos entre otras cosas necesarias para su negocio. Benita se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Benita Del Socorro is 29 years old and is a food vendor.  She has been doing this work, which is her main source of income, for more than 11 years.  Benita combines taking care of her household with her business.  She is seeking this loan to buy basic grains, vegetables, fruits, bags, containers and other stock needed for her business.  She promises to meet her payments on time.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Yesenia De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Yesenia es un clienta nueva en la institución, la actividad de la cliente es la venta de mercadería en general, la señora Yesenia sale todos los días para ofrecer los diferentes productos. Con el paso del tiempo ella decidió buscar este trabajo y así  iniciar su trabajo de venta de estos productos. El crédito será invertido en la compra de lápiz labial, cremas, perfumes, ropa interior entre otras. Ella junto a su pareja actualmente tienen dos hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Por lo que quiere aprovechar este crédito por la temporada que se acerca.
texts.en: Yesenia is a new client of this microfinance institution. She and her partner have two small children. She sells general merchandise.  Every day she goes out selling different products.  Some time ago, she decided to seek out this work and began selling these products.  The loan will be used to buy lipstick, cremes, perfumes, underwear, and so on. She wants to use this credit to take advantage of the holiday season.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Jahir Wladimir

texts.es:
Jahir Wladimir Z. S. tiene 19 años. Es soltero con los padres, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No  Tiene  hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Jahir se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ser un profesional.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jahir Wladimir Z. S., 19, is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He doesn’t have children.

The members of the La Union communal bank, located in Aguas Frías, Ventanas canton, are short cycle farmers, corn, rice and broad bean.  They have been in this occupation for a long time.

Jahir has been a farmer, especially of corn, rice and broad beans, for three years.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them in the Ventanas market.

He is asking for funds to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and climatic variations.  His dream is to become a professional.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Jimmy Omar

texts.es:
Jimmy Omar V. C. tiene 19 años. Es soltero con un hermano y un tio, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No  Tiene  hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Jimmy se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir ahorrando.
Le gusta hacer deporte
texts.en:
Jimmy Omar V. C., 19, is single and lives with a brother and an uncle in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He doesn’t have children.

The members of the La Union communal bank, located in Aguas Frías, Ventanas canton, are short cycle farmers, corn, rice and broad bean.  They have been in this occupation for a long time.

Jimmy has been a farmer, especially of corn, rice and broad beans, for three years.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them in the Ventanas market.

He is asking for funds to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and climatic variations.  His dream is to continue to save.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Leyanis Beatriz

texts.es:
Leyanis C. Púa es una jovial mujer madre de 2 hijos en las edades de 2 y 17 años que vive con su esposo, un trabajador en el área de logística, con el que comparte  grandes sueños en su hogar. Para Leyanis las adversidades han sido el motor de su buen desempeño empresaria y el logro de su autonomía, con su pequeño hijo, ahora  muy saludable, por el cual debió abandonar su trabajo en una empresa, para dedicarse a él por motivos de enfermedad, pero   ella nunca abandonó su sueño de sacarlo adelante y generar un ingreso que los beneficiara a todos en su hogar, al lado de su esposo consagrado a esa misma gestión.
Leyanis inició su negocio  como comerciante con un valor agregado especial: estudió Mercadotécnica en la universidad y tiene una inspiración natural para con sus manos volver todo lo que toca hermoso; así es como hace su trabajo de empacar para su pequeño almacén  llamado “Miscelánea Detalles y Papelería L.K. detalles que sirven de obsequios para que sus clientes compren y los  intercambien en épocas especiales como cumpleaños, grados. Leyanis es muy intuitiva y creativa, así lo demuestra con su propio estilo durante las   promociones como las de “Lleve  dos por uno”, o compre un articulo especial y juegue en la rifa de un pesebre como es él que ahora, aprovechando la navidad,  tiene con el fin de lograr hacer atractiva su venta; esta es la razón por la cual su crecimiento empresarial ha ido en la dirección correcta y ella adiciona un comportamiento social,  productivo y muy responsable a todo lo que hace, así es como está afiliada  a muchas revistas especializadas,  donde con una de ellas promociona  perfumes,  con la otra  bolsos, con otra cosméticos, con otra ropa y mas aun quien la conoce no deja de ofrecerle oportunidades de trabajo con los productos, esto ocurre en la actualidad con mercancías variadas que una representante de Panamá país hermano, le va a traer a consignación, es decir entrega los productos y si no los vende los devuelve y esto a Leyanis le parece una gran oportunidad que aceptará.
Su credikiva es su primer financiamiento con él comprara juguetes, cosméticos para hacer anchetas navideñas que desde ahora está empacando para responder a la oportunidad de ventas que se genera en el mes de Diciembre en especial a final de este período.
texts.en:
Leyanis C. Púa is a cheerful mother of two children aged 2 and 17.  She lives with her husband who works in the field of logistics.  They both share big dreams.  For Leyanis, the adversities she has faced have been the driving force behind her determination as a businesswoman and her achieving her independence together with her young son who is now very healthy but for whom she had to leave her job to devote herself to him because he was sick in the past.  However, Leyanis never abandoned her dream of getting ahead in life and making an income which would benefit everybody in her household, alongside her husband who is committed to the same effort.

Leyanis started her business as a saleswoman with special added value: she studied marketing at university and has a natural gift which turns everything she touches beautiful; this is how she does her work in her small store called “Miscelánea Detalles y Papelería L.K.”, (Miscellany, Little Gifts and Stationery L.K) 'little gifts' that her customers buy and exchange at special times such as birthdays and graduations.

Leyanis is very intuitive and creative.  She demonstrates this in her own style during the promotions she runs such as 'Buy one Get one Free' or 'Buy a special article and enter into a Christmas raffle' which is her current promotion taking advantage of Christmas.  She makes these offers to make her sales attractive.  This is why her business growth has gone in the right direction and she is very social, productive and responsible in everything she does.  This is how she is affiliated to many specialist magazines.  With one she promotes perfumes, with another she promotes bags, with another cosmetics, with another clothes and more besides.  Those who know her don't hesitate to offer her opportunities to work with products.  This is currently the case with various merchandise that a representative from the beautiful country of Panama will bring her on consignment, that is to say the representative delivers the products and if she doesn't manage to sell them she returns them.  This seems a great opportunity that Leyanis will accept.

This is Leyanis' first Kiva loan and she will use it to buy toys and cosmetics for Christmas deals that she is working on from this moment in order to respond to the sales opportunity that the month of December, and particularly the end of this period, generates.

loans.use: To buy toys and cosmetics to make Christmas deals and sell them in the month of December

loans.name: Lucero Group

texts.es:
Juana es socia del Bancomunal Lucero, que inicia su sexto ciclo con 15 socias. Juana tiene 61 años, es casada y tiene 6 hijos.  
Juana se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa (polos, pantalones) por pedidos que trae desde Juliaca.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de panetones, juguetes, peluches, ropa, para la campaña navideña.
Pertenece a FINCA desde hace 2 coclos, ingreso por invitación de una amiga, le gusta las reuniones de su bancomunal porque le hablan de diferentes temas como familia, matrimonio, salud, valores y sobre todo puede ahorrar. Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the Lucero communal bank which is starting its 6th cycle with 15 members.  She is 61 years old, married and has six children.

Juana sells cosmetics and clothes (polo-type shirts, pants) on order that she brings from Juliaca.

The loan she is asking for will be used to buy panettones (cakes consumed traditionally during the Christmas festivities), toys, stuffed toys and clothing for the Christmas sales season.

She has been a member of FINCA for two cycles.  She joined thanks to an invitation from a friend.  She enjoys her communal bank meetings because there are talks on various subjects like: family, marriage, health and values and above all because she can save.  Her dream is that the business grows and to be able to help her family.

loans.use: To buy panettones, toys, stuffed toys and clothes.

loans.name: Gerardo Geronimo

texts.es:
Gerardo Geronimo Y. Z. tiene 42 años. Vive en Unión Libre con la compañera, vive en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No tiene hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Gerardo se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajan para la familia y tener un hijo.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gerardo Gerónimo Y. Z., 42, lives in a common law marriage with his spouse in Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.  He has no children.

The members of La Union communal bank, located in Aguas Frías, Ventanas canton, are farmers, especially of corn, rice and broad bean.  They have been in this occupation for a long time.

Gerardo has a farmer especially of corn, rice and broad bean for three years.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them in the Ventanas market.

He is asking for funds to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations.  His dream is to continue working for the family.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Otoniel

texts.es: Otoniel C.  S. es un hombre de 36 años propietario del negocio “Variedades Daniel”, donde comercializa, pedrería, calzado, ropa y papelería en general  desde hace 11 años. Esta experiencia le ha permitido  a Otoniel un ligero crecimiento de su negocio, pero muchas veces su capital no alcanza para responder al surtido que requiere y debe esperar recoger el dinero de sus ventas a crédito para poder surtir y cumplirle a sus clientes. Este es el motivo de su primer crédito con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, porque con su credikiva   va a tener un capital de trabajo para invertir en una gran época,  donde las ventas usualmente se incrementa y  con él comprará de contado, útiles de aseo, ropa infantil, artículos para el hogar  que empacará  agregando motivos navideños,  para llamar la atención de sus clientes,  en la temporada  en que amigos, vecinos, familiares  intercambian los aguinaldos  de fin de año. Su sueño es tener un gran almacén bien surtido y con él una vivienda propia donde estaría ubicado. Su mayor desafío son las temporadas en que se disminuyen las ventas y tiene que ingeniárselas para lograr atraer a sus clientes con precios de oportunidad y una buena exhibición.   Otoniel es un hombre que se muestra muy trabajador y con mucha disciplina de trabajo que tiene sus metas bien claras y sabe para donde va su negocio que en la actualidad tiene un capital de trabajo de $3.440.000 COP, un margen de utilidad de 42,8% y proyecta con su nuevo credikiva una utilidad de 50%, teniendo en cuenta la época en la cual esta haciendo la inversión a su negocio, que es de gran movimiento comercial y las solicitudes de sus clientes rentables a las cuales responderá.
texts.en: Otoniel C. S. is 36 years old and owns a business called "Variedades Daniel", where he has sold precious stones, shoes, clothing, and stationery, and other items for 11 years. This experience has allowed a slight growth of his business, but many times he does not have enough working capital to adequately stock his store, and he has to wait to pick up the money from his credit sales in order to stock the store and fulfill his clients. This is the reason for his first credit with the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, because it will give him working capital to invest during a great season of the year, when sales usually increase. He will purchase cleaning supplies, baby clothing, and household goods, which he will pack with Christmas decorations, to attract the attention of his clients, during the season in which friends, neighbors, and relatives exchange gifts. His dream is to have a great, well-stocked store and his own house. However, his greatest challenge is the seasons in which sales decrease, and he has to figure out how to attract clients with low prices and a nice display. Otoniel is a very hard-working man with a lot of discipline in his job. His goals are clear, and he knows where his business is going. Currenlty, he has a working capital of $3.440.000 COP and a profit margin of 42.8%. He projects it will reach 50% with his new credit, keeping in mind the season in which he is making the investment in his business, which is highly commercial and profitable, and he will be able to respond to his clients' requests.

loans.use: He will buy cleaning tools, baby clothing, and household goods which he will pack with Christmas decorations to attract the attention of his clients.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda es socia del Bancomunal Desarrollo, tiene 35 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos.
Yolanda se dedica a la venta de verduras surtidas en el mercado Nery García Zarate. Tiene un terreno en el lugar denominado Maracaná donde hay muchos puquiales, ella aprovecha esa agua y siembra todo tipo de verduras y las lleva  para su venta al Mercado Nery García Zarate, aprendió de ésta actividad desde muy niña de sus abuelos.
Está en Finca hace 2 años, le gusta porque puede ahorrar y acceder al crédito, gracias a las capacitaciones aprendió a mejorar su relación familiar.
Su sueño es construir su casa propia y abrir una tienda, para estar mas cerca de sus hijos.
texts.en: Yolanda is a member of the Bancomunal Desarollo. She is 35, is married and has 5 children. Yolanda works selling assorted vegetables in the Nery García Zarate Market. She has a plot of land where there are many fresh springs, and she takes advantage of the water and sews all types of vegetables, taking them to the Nery García Zarate Market to sell. Yolanda learned this activity from her grandparents when she was very small. She has been with Finca for 2 years, and likes that she can save and access credit. Thanks to the training she has learned to better manage her family's situation. Her dream is to construct her own home and open a shop, to be closer to her children.

loans.use: Aircondition her storage area to better sell vegetables

loans.name: Elsa Maria

texts.es: Elsa tiene 61 años, vive con su esposo sus hijos que ya son adultos viven de manera independiente. Ella tiene la venta de mercadería en general pues sale  todos los días a vender productos y en su vivienda. Donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos como toallas, sabanas, cosméticos, calzado y bisutería.  Atiende todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. A pesar de las dificultades que ha enfrentado a salido adelante. El financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima. Sus metas son tener una gran tienda localizada en el mercado.
texts.en: Elsa is 61 years old and lives with her husband. Her children are already adults and live on their own. Elsa sells general supplies and goes out every day to sell products and also does it out of her home, where she offers a wide variety of products like towels, sheets, cosmetics, footwear and jewelry. She works every day from 7 a.m. until 9 p.m. Despite the difficulties that have confronted her she keeps making headway. She is requesting the loan to purchase more merchandise. Her goal is to have a bigger store located in the market.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Dalberto Bayron

texts.es:
Dalberto Bayron C. P. tiene 22 años. Es soltero con la madre y un hermano, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No  Tiene  hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Aguas Frías, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Dalberto se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Dalberto Bayron C. P. is 22 years old. He is single and, with his mother and one brother, lives in the region of Ventanas in the Los Ríos Province. He doesn't have children. The members of the VRC EI LA UNION are located in the Aguas Frías precinct, which belongs to the Ventanas region. This communal bank works at agricultural activities and during the season sows maize, rice, and beans. The members have been doing this activity for a long time. Dalberto has worked in agriculture, namely maize, rice, and beans, for 3 years. He purchases his products in Ventanas and sells them in the Ventanas market and in the same precinct. He is seeking this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilisers for his crops. The support of the loan will help him economically to supplement his necessities. He faces challenges such as plagues and diseases and a variable climate. Dalberto's dream is to purchase a house. He enjoys playing sport.

loans.use: Agricultural inputs and fertilisers

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Trinidad tiene 54 años, vive con su esposo, su hija y su nieto en su casa que es propia. Desde que era niña, aprendió el arte del tejido, hoy, el tejer se ha convertido en su gran fuente de ingreso económico. Por otra parte, también realiza la venta de jugos de frutas, en un establecimiento que acondiciono en el interior de su casa, lugar donde también tiene su taller de tejidos. A diario trabaja en estas actividades, en ocasiones su nieto la acompaña mientras ella teje. Le agrada su trabajo porque  puede plasmar toda su creatividad en cada diseño que confecciona, esto le ha dado ventaja frente a los clientes, quienes siempre le hacen pedidos ya que conocen la calidad de su trabajo, y por tal, espera  continuar con esta actividad. Es el crédito número 1 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que recibirá, comprará lana e hilos al por mayor.
texts.en: Trinidad is 54 years old and lives with her husband, daughter and grandson in her own home. When she was a small child she learned the art of weaving and today this weaving has become a large source of income for her. As well, Trinidad also sells fruit juices in an establishment that is air-conditioned inside her home, a place where she also has her weaving workshop. Each day she works in these activities, and on occasion her grandson keeps her company while she weaves. Trinidad is thankful for her work because she can express all her creativity in each design that she makes, and this has given her an advantage with her customers, who regularly place orders as they know the quality of her work. She hopes to continue this work. This is Trinidad's first loan with MFP, and she is very content to know that she has financial support. She is thankful to everyone who supported her with the loan as she knows it will be very useful in progressing her business. With the loan that she will receive, Trinida will purchase large quantities of wool and fabric.

loans.use: Purchase wool and fabric in large quantities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Las Camelias Group

texts.es:
Julia es socia del Bancomunal Las Camelias, tiene 36 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos.
Julia se dedica a la venta D. ropa para: damas, caballeros, niños y también es artesana, elabora  bolsos chullos, flores y hace bordados.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá para surtir su mercadería (ropas: niños, caballeros, damas), ahora que ya se aproxima la campaña naviD.ña. AtienD. sólo pedidos el cual le pagan a diario, en partes o al instante.
Le gusta Finca porque le hablan sobre como hacer negocios y aprendió a ahorrar.
Su sueño es que crezca su negocio y poder tener una tienda, tambien esta ahorrando para la Educación D. sus hijos y comprarse un casa propia.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the Las Camelias Communal Bank. She is a 36-year-old married mother of 2 children. She sells apparel for men, women, and children. She also makes handicrafts like bags, knit Peruvian hats with earflaps, and embroidery.

She will invest this loan in obtaining merchandise (apparel for men, women, and children) now that the Christmas season is approaching. She only sells by order and is paid daily, in installments, or at the moment of purchase.

She likes Finca because they tell her how to do business, and she has learned how to save money. Her dream is for her business to grow and for her to own a store. She is also saving money for her children's education and to buy a house.

loans.use: Apparel for men, women, and children

loans.name: Karla Ivon

texts.es: Karla Ivon tiene  29 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa usada. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos con Fundación pues ha demostrado ser responsable.  La ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda, desde hace  4 años que se dedica a este negocio, sus inicios  se dan por consejos de una amiga decide realizar las ventas de su ropa de manera ambulante, a ciertas personas que son amigas suyas fue así que ella observo que era un negocio rentable crédito es para la compra de materia prima como faldas, pantalones, trajes, blusas entre otras cosas, por lo que se aproxima una buena temporada.
texts.en: Karla Ivon is 29 years old and has a business selling used clothing. This is not her first loan with Kiva partner Fundación Leon, and she has shown herself to be responsible. She has run her business out of her home for the past four years. She started on the advice of a friend and decided to sell on the street, which some of her friends also did and she saw it was profitable. She plans to use the loan to purchase merchandise such as skirts, pants, suits, blouses and other items, since the good season will soon be here.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
Haydee de 53 años, tiene un negocio de venta de comida rápida y cocos. Vive con sus dos hijos en una zona urbana llamada suburbio de Guayaquil y caracterizada porque la mayoría de habitantes son comerciantes.

Tuvo la necesidad de tener su propio negocio porque su ex esposo la abandono y se quedo con sus dos hijos. Inicio su negocio vendiendo coco hace 15 años atrás pero como le fue muy bien decidió implementar la venta de tortillas para tener más ingresos. En la actualidad tiene un puesto en la calle de venta de cocos y tortilla trabaja desde muy temprano para vender todo lo que lleva en el día. Cada tortilla la vende a $ 0.50, cocos $ 0.07 c/u y corviches (Mezcla de verde rallado con refrito y maní)  a $ 0.50 c/u. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar una máquina para hacer más rápido las comidas rápidas ya que son elaborados plátanos. En el futuro quiere buscar opciones para hacer entregas a difeentes negocios.
texts.en:
Haydee is 53 years old and sells fast food and coconuts. She lives with her two children in an urban zone called Suburbio de Guayaquil. This zone is characterized by having many residents who are merchants.
 
She had to start a business because her ex-husband left her and she is responsible for their two children. She started selling coconuts 15 years ago, and because she was very successful and wanted to increase her income decided to add the sale of tortillas.  Presently, she is a street vendor selling coconuts and tortillas from very early in the morning so that it is possible to sell everything daily. Each tortilla and/or ‘corviche’ [plantain] is sold for $0.50 and each coconut for $0.07.
 
She is requesting the loan to buy a machine to prepare the food that includes plantain more efficiently. She would also like to explore the possibility of delivering them to different businesses.

loans.use: to purchse a machine

loans.name: Luz Del Amanecer Group

texts.es:
Grupo .Solidario . LUZ DEL AMANECER

BERTA CARINA C. P..tiene 21 años de edad es soltera, estudia un curso de ingles los fines de semana, ella se dedica a la venta de roscas de feria,  su negocio lo realiza en diferentes lugares de ambulante , porque en el lugar donde haya feria es donde ella va a vender su producto y a veces entrega por mayor cuando le encargan, su credito lo necesita para comprar cereales para elavorar dulces porque necesita extenderse a otros lugares.
GRISELDA MARISOL G. S.. tiene 23 años de edad, es casada tiene un hijo de 1 año, ella se dedica al alquiler de sillas, mesas, manteles etc., Su credito lo necesita para poder comprar mas sillas pero pequeñas, porque cuando le alquilan las sillas le piden pequeñas pero ella cuenta con pocas sillas pequeñas, ella dice que para que pueda obtener mas clientes tendria que tener lo necesario.
ANGELA P. C.
 tiene 54 años de edad, tiene 7 hijos, pero de los 7 tiene 3 ya casados, solo mantiene a cuatro con ella, que la ayudan a sacar su producto que vende, ella se dedica a la venta de panitos de feria, dulces tipicos, y papas fritas, ella necesita su credito para comprar cereales para elavorar dulces y extenderse a otros lugares, para mejorar la venta de sus productos y surtir mas producto, para obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Solidarity Group "Luz del Amanecer" [Dawn Light]

Berta Carina C. P. is 21 years of age, single, and is taking a course in English on the weekends. She earns a living selling baked goods in various places as a street vendor. Wherever there is a street market that's where she goes to sell her product and sometimes she delivers wholesale when she gets orders. Her loan is needed to buy grains to make sweets because she needs to branch out into more areas. 

Griselda Marisol G. S. is 23 years of age, married and has a one-year-old child. She earns a living renting chairs, tables, tablecloths, etc. Her loan is needed to be able to purchase more chairs, small ones because when people rent the chairs they ask for small ones and she has only a few small chairs. She says that in order to get more customers she would have to have what's needed. 

Angela P. C. is 54 years of age and has seven children. Of the seven, three are already married; only four of them still live with her and they help her get her product out for sale. She earns a living selling baked goods, traditional candies and french fries. She needs her loan to purchase grains for making sweets and to branch out into more areas in order to improve her sales and have more product to offer, in order to make better earnings.

loans.use: To purchase grains for making sweets and to purchase small chairs

loans.name: Elvin Francisco

texts.es: Elvin Francisco tiene 26 años. Es casado y  vive su esposa e hijo. Elvin tiene su panadería ubicada en su vivienda.  El aprendió este medio de vida porque necesitaba proporcionarle a su familia un medio de ingreso, desde hace mas de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Desde las 5 de la mañana inicia su labor por lo que tiene que elaborarlos y algunas veces venderlos en las calles la mayoría de sus clientes son familiares amigos vecinos y público en general.  Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos y realizar la elaboración de su delicioso pan ya que se acerca diciembre y son los meses que mas demanda obtiene. Su sueño es terminar los estudios profesionales y le gustaría tener un terreno para construir una casa.
texts.en: Elvin Francisco is 26 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and son. Elvin owns a bakery located in his house. He learned this trade because he needed to provide income for his family. He has had this business for more than four years. He begins his work at 5 am, making the bread and sometimes selling it on the street. The majority of his customers are relatives, friends, neighbors, and the general public. He is requesting this loan in order to buy supplies and continue making his delicious bread since December is approaching and these are the months when he has the highest demand. His dream is to finish his professional studies, and he would also like to obtain land in order to build a house.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Florci

texts.es: Florci tiene 43 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 15 años se dedica a la venta de madera, actividad que lo realiza acompañada de su esposo, quien extrae la madera de los campos colmados de árboles que compra, y con la ayuda de su sierra eléctrica, empieza con la tala. Luego almacena la madera que es extraída para ser vendida a las madereras y fábricas de muebles. Las ventas que realiza, lo hace semanalmente para asegurarse y recibir las ganancias. Paralelo a esta actividad, también cría vacas y cada camada, vende los becerros que produce. Su deseo es  continuar con la venta de madera y crecer en capital de trabajo. Es el crédito número 10 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Asimismo agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más árboles.
texts.en: Florci is a 43-year-old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in their own house. She has been selling lumber for over 15 years alongside her husband, who extracts wood from the fields that are filled with trees that he buys. With the help of his electric saw, he begins with the felling. He then stores the wood so that he can sell it to timber merchants and furniture factories. She sells lumber weekly so that she can be sure to earn profits. Parallel to this activity, she also raises cattle and sells the calves that are born. Her wish is to continue selling lumber and to increase her capital. This is her 10th loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support. Furthermore, she is pleased to be a part of his communal bank because all its members are responsible and very united. Likewise, she gives thanks to the people who will make this loan possible because it will be quite useful for the progress of her business. She will invest this loan in purchasing more trees.

loans.use: Purchase trees

loans.name: Maria Eliett

texts.es: Maria Eliett de 27 años, es una joven muy trabajadora, la cual vive junto a su esposo y un hijo.  Maria se dedica a la venta de comida  en donde ofrece los platillos como gallo pinto, tajadas, refrescos, queso frito, maduro entre otros el negocio se encuentra en su casa de habitación, lo cual es de mucho beneficio para ella debido a que le permite cuidar de su hogar al mismo tiempo que atiende su negocio. A pesar que cuenta con mucha competencia, ella posee varios clientes los cuales a diario consumen de sus productos. solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de granos básicos, verduras, bolsas, cubiertos y platos esto le beneficiara atender de la mejor manera a sus clientes y así obtener algunos nuevos. Maria desea mucho poder aumentar sus ventas y de esta forma vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en: Maria Eliett, 27 years old, is a very hardworking young woman who lives with her husband and son. Maria is a food vendor, offering dishes such as gallo pinto, fried plantain, soft drinks, fried cheese, and others. The business is located at her house, which is very beneficial for her since it allows her to take care of her home at the same time that she runs her business. Even though she has a lot of competition, she has many customers who buy her products daily. She is requesting a loan in order to buy basic grains, vegetables, bags, cutlery, and plates. This will allow her to serve her customers in the best way possible and thereby obtain some new ones. Maria would very much like to be able to increase her sales and in this way provide a better life to her family.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Socrates Menandro

texts.es: Sócrates de 66 años, vive en el barrio de esquípulas es casado y juntos se esfuerzan cada día para salir adelante. Desde muy joven ha sido emprendedor Por la falta de empleo decidió buscar un oficio antes las diversas necesidades que pasaba su familia. Actualmente el se dedica a la venta de leña, hace mas de 5 años que tiene este negocio,  ya que es una forma de generar ingresos pero aún así continua con las ganas de siempre por progresar. Es el primer crédito que tiene con Fundación y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá salir adelante en sus negocios. Con el crédito tiene planeado invertir en leña.
texts.en: Sócrates is 66-years-old.  He lives in the Esquípulas neighborhood.  He is married and together they work every day to get ahead.  Since he was very young, he has been an entrepreneur.  Because of the lack of employment, he decided to pursue a trade to meet the various needs of his family.  Currently he works selling firewood.  He has had this job for more than five years.  It is a way to bring in income, but he still has the same desire to progress more.  This is the first loan he will have with the Foundation and he promises to make his payments punctually as he doesn’t want to look bad to the people who made this contribution possible which will allow him to get ahead in his business.  With the loan he plans to invest in firewood.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Restauracion Group

texts.es:
GRUPO .SOLIDARIO . RESTAURACION

FILOMENA ESPAÑA B..
tiene 58 años de edad tiene 7 hijos, pero cinco de ellos son casados y tiene dos que la apoyan en su actividad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de guipiles a mano y crianza de pollos, ella dice que necesita su prestamo para poder obtener materia prima para confeccionar tejidos, para tener mejores ventas y mejores ganancias, para el mantenimiento de su familia.
PAULA AGUSTINA JOSEFINA C. C..   es casada tiene tres hijos pequeños, tiene 27 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de guipiles a mano desde hace seis años , ella necesita su credito para comprar materia prima para confeccionar tejidos para poder elaborar su producto, tiene tres personas que la ayudan a tejer sus guipiles y tambien ella teje, ella dice que en esta epoca es cuando ella obtiene mejores ventas.
ELVA C. MUCHUCH.
tiene 38 años de edad, tiene solo un hijo, ella se dedica a la elaboración de guipiles a mano, tiene dos muchachas que la ayudan a elaborar su producto, pero ella dice que en estos tiempos se vende bastante su producto y ella no tiene suficiente capital para obtener hilos que es lo que necesita para elaborar sus guipiles, ella dice que el credito lo utilizara para comprar materia prima para elaborar tejidos y  pueda sacar mas producto y poder obtener buena venta.
texts.en:
'Restauración' community bank.

Filomena E. B. is 58 years old and has 7 children.  Five of her children are married and two of them support her in her business.  She makes 'guipiles' (traditional tunics) by hand and raises chickens.  She says that she needs her loan so that she can obtain materials for weaving her products so that she will have better sales and better profits to support her family.

Paula Agustina Josefina C. C. is married and has three young children.  She is 27 years old and also makes 'guipiles' by hand.  She has been doing this for six years.  She needs her loan to buy materials for weaving her products.  She has three people who help her to weave her 'guipiles' and she also weaves.  She says that she has better sales at this time of year.

Elva C. Muchuch is 38 years old.  She has one child.  She also makes 'guipiles' by hand.  She has two girls who help her make her products.  However, she says that she sells a lot of her products at this time of year and she doesn't have enough capital to buy the threads that she needs to make her 'guipiles'.  She says that she will use her loan to buy materials for her weaving.  This way she will be able to make more products and obtain good sales.

loans.use: To buy threads for weaving their products

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas, es socia del Banco Comunal Dignidad, tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos.
Felicitas es feriante, viaja a Cangallo, donde vende frutas surtidas, verduras surtidas, pan y en Cangallo compra: maíz, trigo, cebada y lo vende los días domingos en la feria de las Américas.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en surtir su mercadería (frutas, pan, verduras, queso)
Lo que le gusta de Finca es que puede acceder al crédito y puede ahorrar. Su sueño es poder construir sus casa.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the Dignidad Microfinance Group. She is a 42-year-old married mother with 5 children.

She is a stallholder at Cangallo, where she sells assorted fruits, vegetables, and breads. At Cangallo, she purchases corn, wheat and barley, which she sells on Sundays at the Feria de las Americas Market.

The loan that he is requesting will be invested in restocking her stand with goods (fruits, bread, vegetables, cheese). What she likes about Finca is that she can obtain a loan and save money. Her dream is to be able to build her own house.

loans.use: Purchase local fruits, vegetables, and breads

loans.name: Emerson

texts.es: Emerson tiene 34 años, vive con su esposa, su hijo y su padre en una casa que le fue heredada por su familia. Desde hace 4 años decidió generarse su propia fuente de ingreso, ofreciendo el servicio de transporte, en la que posee un moto taxis, recorriendo todas las calles de su localidad. El trabajo que realiza es diario y solo descansa un día a la semana, menciona además, que este trabajo tiene sus riesgos, pero sabe también que tiene su recompensa, para él lo mas importante es generar ingresos y ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Por otro lado también se dedica a la siembra de alfalfa, ya que tiene una granja de cuyes, en donde su esposa es la encargada de cuidarlos y  alimentarlos. Su meta es tener otra movilidad más y tener una granja de cuyes más amplia. Es el crédito número 13 con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de llantas para la compra de llantas nuevas y también para comprar abono y sembrar alfalfa que sirve de forraje para los cuyes.
texts.en:
Emerson is a 34-year-old man who lives with his wife, his son, and his father in a house that he inherited from his family. Four years ago, he decided to start his own transportation business. He has a motorcycle taxi and rides throughout the streets of his town. He works six days a week and has one day off. He adds that the this job has its risks, but he also knows that it has its reward. For him, the most important thing is being able to earn a living and offer his family a better quality of life.

He also grows alfalfa on the side because he has a guinea pig farm, and his wife is in charge of caring for and feeding them. His goal is to obtain another vehicle and expand his guinea pig farm. This is his 13th loan with MFP. He is very happy to know that he has financial support. Furthermore, he is pleased to be a part of his communal bank because all its members are responsible and very united. He gives thanks to the people who will make this loan possible because it will be quite useful for the progress of his business. He will invest this loan in purchasing new tires and purchasing fertilizer so that he can plant alfalfa for his guinea pigs.

loans.use: Purchase new tires and sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es:
Marleny es socia del Banco Comunal Dignidad, tiene 25 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 6 años y 5 mesesde edad. Marleny y su esposo se dedican a la confección de sombreros de paño y piel de conejo, su esposo antes trabaja en una fabrica donde confeccionaban estos sombreros un día decidieron tener su propio negocio comenzaron a viajar a Bolivia a traer los paños para las confección, trabajan en su casa y los distribuyen en las tiendas en Ayacucho.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de telas de paños para la elaboración de sombreros.
Le gusta las reuniones de su bancomunal porque pueden acceder al crédito y sobre todo puede ahorrar, lo que aprendió en las capacitaciones es a ser responsable, puntual, salud y familia.
Su sueño es poder tener su casa propia y que siga creciendo su negocio.
texts.en:
Marleny is a member of the Dignidad Microfinance Group. She is a 25-year-old married mother with 2 children ages 6 and 5 months. Marleny and her husband make wool and rabbit fur hats. Her husband used to work in a hatmaking factory, until one day they decided to start their own business. They started to travel to Bolivia to bring the wool cloth to make the hats. They work from home and distribute their products to stores in Ayacucho.

The loan that she is requesting will be invested in purchasing wool cloth to make hats.

She likes her group's meetings because she can obtain loans and, above all, she can save money. From the training, she learned how to be responsible and punctual, and she learned about health and family issues.

Her dream is to be able to own a house, and she would like for her business to keep growing.

loans.use: Purchase wool cloth for hatmaking

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Maria Luisa; ella tiene 64 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas, ella trae diferentes frutas de la ciudad de Quillabamba y los vende en forma ambulatoria en la ciudad del Cusco o diferentes distritos, la socia vende manzanas, plátanos, naranjas, uvas y duraznos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Siempre Unidos" (Always United). The bank is located in the Cusco district, in the province of Cusco and the Cusco department. 
The member is Maria, she is 64 years old and is a widow with 4 children. The member combines her household tasks with a business selling fruit. She brings various fruits from the city of Quillabamba and she sells them from a cart in the streets of Cusco or in other districts. She sells apples, bananas, oranges, grapes, and peaches. The member wants to grow her business selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to buy fruits in bulk. 
The member is grateful to those who are helping her to realize this dream through this loan, and she promises to make her repayments according to the agreed timetable.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to buy fruits in bulk

loans.name: Martha Azucena

texts.es: Martha Azucena es una joven emprendedora inicio a laborar en la venta de ropa usada. Los pedidos han aumentado por lo que tiene la necesidad de proporcionarle a sus clientes lo que ellos solicitan. Este es el segundo préstamo que solicita por lo que siempre está buscando la forma de salir adelante. Martha sueña con abrir un establecimiento al público en el mercado en donde asisten muchos clientes. Considera que no le teme a la competencia porque no es fácil ofrecer prendas de buena calidad a precios bajos como ella lo hace. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en: Martha Azucena is an enterprising young woman who began working selling used clothing.  Her orders have increased and as a result she needs to get her clients what they have requested.  This is the second loan that she has requested as she is always looking for a way to get ahead.  Martha dreams of opening her own establishment to sell to the public in the market where she has many customers.  She isn’t afraid of competition because she knows it isn’t easy to offer good quality clothing articles at low prices like she does.  The loan will be used to buy items to sell.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Trabajadoras De Fe Group

texts.es:
GRUPO SOLIDARIO TRABAJADORES D. FE
Este grupo está integrado por Olga Esperanza U. L. quien es dueña D. un tienda D. ropa en la comunidad donD. vive, también estaba don Patricio Z. X. quien lamentablemente falleció el 11 D. febrero del año en curso, quien sus compañeras lamentan tanto la muerte D. don Patricio ya que el siempre fue muy responsable con sus pagos y ahora pues ya no está. 

También esta Enna Elvira O., quien es dueña D. una farmacia ubicada en Chuarrancho, ella nos cuenta que gracias al crédito que se le otorgo pudo ampliar su farmacia comprar medicamentos que le hacían falta y comprar una vitrina y así poder exhibir todos los medicamentos, además compro cosméticos y un poco D. mercería para tener surtido el negocio ya que le piden muchas cosas ahora ella está muy contenta porque su negocio se ve más vistoso y pueD. obtener un poco mas D. ganancia agradece la oportunidad que se le concedió y espera seguir cumpliendo con su responsabilidad.

*Patricio no aparece en la foto para proteger a su familia.
texts.en:
"Workers Solidarity Group of Faith"
This group is maD. up of 3 individuals. 
Olga Esperanza U. Loco is the owner of a clothing store in the neighborhood where she lives. Patricio Z. X., who unfortunately passed away on February 11th, was also a member of the group. His friends and acquaintances very much lament his passing, as he was very responsible with his payments.

Enna Elvira O. is the third member of the group. She is the owner of a pharmacy located in Churrancho. She tells us that thanks to this loan she was able to improve her pharmacy and purchase medicine that she didn't have previously in stock. She also purchased a glass case to exhibit all of her medications. Further, she purchased cosmetics and a little bit of additional merchandise to keep her business going since her customers ask for many products. She is very happy because her business is getting more customers and she has a little bit more income thanks to this opportunity  and she hopes to continue with her responsibilities. 

*Patricio is not in the picture to protect his family.

loans.use: to buy products for the store, such as medicine and electronics.

loans.name: Lorena Patricia

texts.es: Lorena de 29 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su hijo Esta luchadora mujer se despierta muy temprano todos los días para empezar con las labores del hogar. Luego se dirige a recorrer las calles de su zona en busca de nuevos clientes para ofrecerles su mercadería de ropa, dice que obtiene regulares ganancias pues como ofrece las prendas al crédito, esto le proporciona la ventaja de cobrar con mayor precio del real. Pero comenta que le desagrada caminar durante largas horas por las calles en busca de nuevos clientes, pero asegura las ventas solo con clientes conocidos o recomendados. Por lo que no es la primera vez que solicita crédito  para la compra de faldas, pantalones, camisas, trajes y otro tipo de prendas.
texts.en: Lorena is 29-years-old and lives in her own house with her son.  She is a woman who fights to get ahead.  She gets up very early everyday to start with her housework.  Then she walks the streets in her area looking for new customers to offer them her clothing merchandise.  She says that she makes regular profits, and as she offers the items on credit this gives her the advantage of charging a higher price than the real price.  But, she commented that she doesn’t like to walk such long hours in the street looking for new customers and she prefers sales only with customers she knows or who are recommended to her.  This is not the first time she is requesting a loan.  It will be to buy skirts, pants, shirts, suits, and other clothing items.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Maria; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos naturales llamados Herbalife que son utilizados para la salud, la socia también trabaja en el municipio de San Sebastián, la socia los productos naturales los vende en forma independiente, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender los productos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar los productos naturales.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Luz María, 40, is a member of the “SIEMPRE UNIDOS” (Always United) communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province, Cusco department.

She has a live in partner and three children.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of natural products of the Herbalife brand that are used for health.  She also works for the town of San Sebastián.  She sells the natural products independently and would like to have a store to sell them in.  She is asking for funds to buy these natural products.

She thanks all those who will be part of her dream and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy natural products.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es: Lizbeth tiene 29 años, es viuda vive con  sus madre, su abuela y sus hijos en casa de sus padres. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a la fabricación de ladrillos, desde entonces aprendió sobre la preparación de este material, hoy en día es su fuente de ingresos y del que es propietaria de una fabrica, el cual lo administra, ahí contrata la mano de obra de peones que la ayudan a seguir adelante en la producción que se ha propuesto. Trabaja diariamente, ya que espera producir mensualmente más de 30 millares de ladrillos para venderlos, de las ganancias que obtendrá le servirán para sostener económicamente a su familia. Por esta razón es que se esfuerza en el trabajo, vigilando el proceso de preparación de éstos ladrillos. Mas adelante tiene planeado tener otro negocio que le genere más ingresos. Es el crédito número 13 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Asimismo agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que recibirá, comprará más insumos y materiales que le servirán para la fabricación de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Lizbeth, 29, is a widow.  She lives with her mother, grandmother and children in her parents’ house.  Since she was a child she has manufactured bricks.  Ever since then she learned how to prepare this type of material.  Today, it’s her source of income in that she owns a factory that she runs.  She hires hands to help her continue to move forward with the production she has proposed.

She works every day and expects to produce 30,000 bricks monthly to sell.  Profits she will earn will be for the economic support of her family.  For this reason she makes quite an effort working and watching over the brick making process.  Later on she’d like to have another business that earns more income.

This is her 13th loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she can count on having financial support.  Besides, she enjoys being part of her communal bank because all her fellow members are responsible and mutually supportive people.

She thanks all the people who will fund the loan she’s requesting because it will be very useful for her business’ progress.  

She will use the loan she gets to buy more supplies and materials that will be useful in brick making.

loans.use: To buy brick making raw materials.

loans.name: Menmay Khoisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Menmay Khoisa; ella tiene 20 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de caramelos y galletas, ella trae de la ciudad de Sicuani y los reparte a las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes, ella trabaja en forma independiente, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de caramelos y galletas teniendo un tienda para poder venderlos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar las galletas y caramelos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Menmay Khoisa, 20, is a member of the “SIEMPRE UNIDOS” (Always United) communal bank which is located in Cusco district belonging to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She has a live in partner and a son.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of candy and cookies.  She brings them from the city of Sicuani and distributes to various grocery stores.  She works independently and would like to improve her candy and cookie sales business by having a store of her own to sell them in.  She is asking for funding to buy cookies and candy.

She thanks all those who will share her dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy cookies and candies.

loans.name: Santos Natividad

texts.es: Santos Natividad tiene 26 años es una joven muy luchadora. Su negocio es una pulpería. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos por lo que ha sido un gran avance. Inicio con fondos propios pues tiene que mantener a su hijo y esposa que viven con él. La mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan una gran variedad de productos es por eso que solicita este crédito con el fin de comprar materia prima necesaria. La competencia que tiene es muy fuerte pero esto no le impide el mejorar el servicio y brindar los mejores precios.
texts.en: Santos Natividad is 26-years-old and is a young man who fights to get ahead.  His business is a small grocery store.  This is not the first time that he has taken out loans and it has helped him to advance.  He began with his own funds, but he has to support his son and his wife who live with him.  The majority of his customers request a great variety of products from him and because of this he is requesting this loan with the goal of purchasing the necessary supplies.  His competition is very strong, but this doesn’t stop him from improving the service he offers and offering the best prices.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María de 35 años, tiene una tienda de víveres. Vive en un cantón llamado Playas uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos.  

Cuando tenía 14 años María empezó a vender confiterías para poder pagar sus estudios ya que ha su corta edad no tenia su familia muchos recursos para estudiar. Desde ese tiempo pudo reunir dinero y tener su propia tienda pero cuando estuvo embarazada tuvo problemas de salud y tuvo que cerrar la tienda por un tiempo ya que era muy riesgoso tener a su bebe. Pero ahora debido a la estabilidad económica que tenía lo abrió de nuevo y lo surtió con más víveres. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 21h00pm y en ocasiones su papa le ayuda a tender el negocio. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, aceite, enlatados para poder surtir más su tienda. En el futuro quiere tener un local grande y que sus hijos estudien en un buen colegio
texts.en:
Maria is 35-years-old.  She has a grocery store.  She lives in a region called Playas (Beaches), one of the touristy regions of Ecuador that has a lot of seafood.  

When she was 14-years-old, Maria started to sell sweets to be able to pay for her studies as at her young age her family didn’t have many resources to allow her to study.  Since that time, she has been able to save money and have her own store, but when she was pregnant she had health problems and had to close the store for some time as it was risky for her to have her baby.  But now, with more financial stability, she opened it again and stocked it with more groceries.  She works from 7AM to 9PM and sometimes her father helps her to attend to her business.

With the loan she would like to buy rice, oil, and canned goods to be able to stock the store better.  In the future she would like to have a large business space and for her children to study in a good school.

loans.use: Rice, oil, canned goods

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Luz; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza y productos naturales, la socia también es guía de turismo los productos naturales y de belleza los vende en forma independiente, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de productos naturales y de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar los productos de belleza y naturales.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Luz, 33, is a member of the “SIEMPRE UNIDOS” (Always United) communal bank which is located in Cusco district belonging to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married.  She alternates her daily chores with a business selling beauty and natural products.  She’s also a tourist guide.  The beauty and natural products she sells independently.  She wants to expand the business and is asking for a loan to buy beauty and natural products.

She thanks all those who will share her dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy beauty and natural products.

loans.name: Duo Solidario Amor Divino Group

texts.es:
Grupo .Solidario . AMOR DIVINO
ELMA ARACELY M. P.. 
 tiene 29 años de edad, es una persona emprendedora y su sueño es que pueda obtener mejores ventas en esta epoca, mas ventas en sus productos, pero para que pueda lograrlo necesita comprar materia prima, para poder  Confeccionar tejidos  y tener mejores ganancias.
MAYRA ELIZABEET  M. P.. ella es soltera tiene 25 años de edad, desde hace seis años se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos a mano y actualmente elabora guipiles a mano, su producto lo vende fuera de Comalapa, ella necesita su credito para comprar mas hilo, para confeccionar tejidos  porque en esta epoca hay mucha demanda y ella quiere aprovechar la epoca para que pueda obtener mejores ventas, para mejorar su economia.
texts.en:
AMOR DIVINO (Divine Love) Communal Bank

ELMA ARACELY M. P.

She is a 29-year-old, enterprising person whose dream is to increase sales of her products during this season.   In order to accomplish this, however, she needs to buy raw materials to make weavings and have better profits.

 MAYRA ELIZABEET  M. P.. 

She is a 25-year-old, single woman.  She has made hand-woven items for six years and is currently making handmade guipiles (traditional blouses).  She sells her items outside Comalapa and needs funds to buy more thread to make the weavings because demand is high during this season and she wants to take advantage of the season to improve sales thus improving her economy.

loans.use: To buy thread.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.
